name: Sauron
deck: He came into existence before the world was created, but was soon drawn to the power of evil. Eventually he created the One Ring, bringing problems to all of Middle-Earth.

name: Talion
deck: A ranger of Gondor who died at the hands of Sauron and was reborn with the powers of a Wraith.

name: Celebrimbor
deck: Celebrimbor was an elf of Eregion during the Second Age of Middle-earth. He forged the rings of power after being deceived by Sauron. After learning the truth, Celebrimbor defied Sauron and was later captured, tortured, and killed for refusing to reveal where he had hidden the rings.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
deck: Cristiano Ronaldo is a Portuguese soccer player who plays primarily as a left winger or an attacking midfielder for Real Madrid.

name: Lionel Messi
deck: Lionel Messi is a soccer player for FC Barcelona. He is considered by many to be the best player in the world. In 2011, he signed a multi-year deal with EA Sports to become the new face of the best-selling FIFA Soccer franchise.

name: Mario
deck: Originally a carpenter named Jumpman, this Italian plumber has gone on to become the most recognizable video game character of them all, starring in a veritable pantheon of titles like kart racing and sports. He has been voiced by Charles Martinet for nearly 20 years.

name: Donkey Kong
deck: The Original Donkey Kong made his debut in the game of the same name, where he tossed barrels at his nemesis Mario. His grandson, Donkey Kong Jr., went on to create a legacy of his own in games such as Donkey Kong Country and Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze.

name: Bowser
deck: Bowser is one of the most iconic villains in gaming. His role as the main antagonist in the Mario franchise has cemented this King of Koopas' status in video game history.

name: Yoshi
deck: Yoshi is a recurring character in the Mario franchise and has since gone on to star in his own games.

name: Princess Peach
deck: Princess Peach Toadstool is usually the damsel in distress from the Mario franchise. She gets kidnapped frequently by Bowser, though she's not averse to being captured by various other villains from time to time.

name: Poochy
deck: Poochy is Yoshi's canine pal and he happily carries Yoshi and Baby Mario on his back across lava and spikes in Yoshi's Island. He was also one of the bosses in Tetris Attack, having been brainwashed by Bowser and Kamek.

name: Pauline
deck: Mario's original girlfriend back in Donkey Kong. We're guessing it didn't work out.

name: Toadette
deck: Toadette is Toad's female counterpart and most commonly appears the various Mario spin-off games, such as the Mario Party and Mario Kart games.

name: Captain Toad
deck: Captain of the Toad Brigade. He is the protagonist of Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker.

name: Cappy
deck: Together, Cappy and Mario are on a mission in Super Mario Odyssey to save Princess Peach and Cappy's sister, Tiara.

name: Ruined Dragon
deck: Ruined Dragon, the Lord of Lightning, is a boss in Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Cookatiel
deck: An avian boss in Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Brigadier Mollosque-Lanceur III
deck: A giant octopus boss in Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Knucklotec
deck: A boss in Super Mario Odyssey which resembles a floating Olmec head with hands.

name: Mechawiggler
deck: A mechanical version of the classic Super Mario enemy.

name: Madame Broode
deck: Leader of the Broodals.

name: Rango
deck: A member of the Broodals.

name: Spewart
deck: A member of the Broodals.

name: Hariet
deck: A member of the Broodals.

name: Topper
deck: A member of the Broodals.

name: Tiara
deck: Cappy's sister.

name: A.J. Styles
deck: A.J. Styles is a professional wrestler for WWE. He was the first-ever wrestler to have won the TNA Grand Slam Wrestling Championship

name: Sting
deck: Sting is a prominent professional wrestler known for his face paint, charisma and energetic ring-style.

name: Samoa Joe
deck: Samoa Joe is a professional wrestler who currently works for NXT Wrestling. He has won many titles and is featured in the game TNA IMPACT!

name: Kurt Angle
deck: Kurt Angle is a professional wrestler who has appeared and worked for WWE and TNA winning both companies World Titles and being a top superstar.

name: Christian
deck: Christian is a professional wrestler who currently works for WWE. He has won the TNA-NWA Championship twice and the WWE World Heavyweight Championship twice.

name: Booker T
deck: Booker T is a semi-retired professional wrestler best known for his time with both WWE and WCW. He is a six time world champion and is currently signed to WWE where he is a commentator on Smackdown.

name: Triple H
deck: Triple H is a wrestler, currently working for the WWE as the Executive Vice President of Talent and Live Events. He is the only man to have won the World Heavyweight Championship 5 times and the 2nd man to win the WWE Championship 8 times. He is also currently the lead of The Authority faction alongside wife Stephanie McMahon.

name: John Cena
deck: John Cena is a professional wrestler who is employed under the WWE. Since his debut in 2003 Cena has appeared in most of WWE games.

name: Vince McMahon
deck: Billionaire owner of World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE), formerly the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). Son of Vince McMahon Sr, the previous owner of the WWWF.

name: Randy Savage
deck: Randy "Macho Man" Savage was a popular professional Wrestler from the 80's all the way into the '00s. His trademarks were his bombastic interviews, in-ring technical prowess, and gravelly voice.

name: The Undertaker
deck: The Undertaker is a professional wrestler working for WWE. He is considered by many to be one of the greatest superstars in WWE history. He has held numerous world titles, and has a record of 21-1 at Wrestlemania.

name: Big Boss Man
deck: Former professional wrestler with the WWF and WCW.

name: Big Show
deck: The Big Show is a professional wrestler currently working for WWE.  He is the only man to ever hold the WWE Championship, WCW Championship, and ECW Championship in a career.  During his time with WCW, he wrestled as "The Giant."

name: John Bradshaw Layfield
deck: John Layfield is a former WWE superstar who holds one of the longest WWE Championship reigns in history. He currently appears as part of WWE's commentary team alongside Byron Saxton and Michael Cole.

name: Chris Jericho
deck: Chris Jericho, nicknamed Y2J, is professional wrestler best known for his time with WWE and he is also the lead singer for the rock band Fozzy. He has won many championships over the years, being the first Undisputed Champion, 9 time Intercontinental Champion (for which he holds the record) as well as the WWE's fourth Grand Slam Champion.

name: Edge
deck: Edge is a retired professional wrestler of the WWE. He held over 20 titles during his career and was the first entry into the 2012 Hall of Fame Ceremony, making him the youngest inductee of all time.

name: The Godfather
deck:
The Godfather is retired a professional wrestler who plays a pimp role and often came to the ring with his "ho train."
Also known as "Papa Shango" in the early 90's.

name: Jeff Hardy
deck: Jeff Hardy is a wrestler currently signed with the TNA brand. He is one of the greatest intercontinental champions and ladder match contestants ever. In 2009 Jeff was arrested for drug trafficking and was bailed out by his brother Matt Hardy.

name: Kane
deck: The Demon Kane is a professional wrestler who currently works for the WWE. He is best known as the Undertaker's little brother and for being the devil's favorite demon.

name: Mick Foley
deck: Mick Foley is a legendary ex-wrestler who appeared as Mankind, Cactus Jack Manson, and Dude Love. He is currently working for WWE.

name: Mark Henry
deck: Mark Henry Is a wrestler working for the WWE, Henry is currently under the Raw brand. He is the self proclaimed "World Strongest Man" and is likely best known for his 'Hall of Pain' angle which led to him winning the World Heavyweight Championship in 2011.

name: Matt Hardy
deck: The former WWE United States, Tag Team, Cruiserweight, European, and Hardcore champion Matt Hardy has made several appearances in WWE related video games. He has wrestled for the WWE, TNA and ROH brands and is the older brother of fellow wrestler Jeff Hardy.

name: Shane McMahon
deck: Shane McMahon is the real-life son of WWE chairman Vince McMahon.

name: Steve Austin
deck: "Stone Cold" Steve Austin is a semi-retired Wrestler who used to wrestle for the WWE. He is regarded as one of the best wrestlers of all time and is best known for his beer-drinking, rude, smash mouth style. He is also known for his signature move known as the "Stone Cold Stunner. He was inducted in the WWE Hall of Fame in 2009.

name: Batista
deck: Batista is a former professional wrestler best known for his time working with WWE. He is a former World Heavyweight, WWE, World Tag Team and WWE Tag Team Champion, as well as a two time Royal Rumble winner, winning the match in both 2005 and 2014.

name: Ric Flair
deck: Ric Flair is a professional wrestler. Widely regarded as one of the greatest of all time, he won over 16 World Championships in his tenure with WCW and WWF/E.

name: Shawn Michaels
deck: Shawn Michaels is a former professional wrestler best known as The Heartbreak Kid (HBK) who was best known with WWE (World Wrestling Entertainment) under the Raw brand, has been wrestling for more than 20 years. He has appeared in many wrestling games.

name: Randy Orton
deck: Randy Orton is a professional wrestler who works for WWE's RAW brand. He is more commonly known as "the Viper" and "the Apex Predator" and was a member of the stable "Evolution." He has won the WWE championship five times and the World Heavyweight Championship twice.

name: Mickie James
deck: Professional wrestler best known for her work with the WWE & TNA

image.image_tag: Photo Shoot, All Images, Mickie james, wrestling, wrestler

name: Rick Rude
deck: "Ravishing" Rick Rude was a professional wrestler best known for his work with the WWF & WCW

name: Jim Neidhart
deck: Jim "The Anvil" Neidhart is best known as a member of the Hart Foundation alongside Bret "The Hitman" Hart.

name: Eddie Guerrero
deck: Eddie Guerrero was a former professional wrestler, often regarded as one of the best performers to ever step foot in a wrestling ring.

name: The Rock
deck: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson is a part time WWE wrestler. He is a third generation star, and a part of the A'Naoi wrestling family.  The Rock is an eight time WWE/WWF Champion, and is considered "The Most Electrifying Man in Sports Entertainment."

name: Bam Bam Bigelow
deck: Best known as one of the most agile big men in professional wrestling history and for his head tattoo's.

name: Mr. Perfect
deck:
Was a great technical wrestler and the epitome of a confident pro wrestler.
Invented and mastered the "Perfect-Plex"

name: The Miz
deck: The Miz is a professional wrestler, WWE superstar and reigning Intercontinental Champion. The Miz is also a former Mr. Money in the Bank and WWE Champion, headlining and defating John Cena to retain championship at Wrestlemania 27. He is also a former WWE Tag Team Champion and United States Champion.

name: The Ultimate Warrior
deck: The Ultimate Warrior is a former professional wrestler. In 1993 he legally changed his name to Warrior (seriously, I am not making that up).

name: Diamond Dallas Page
deck: DDP is a former WCW/WWE wrestler who appeared in several games.

name: Razor Ramon
deck: A professional wrestler, formerly of the WWF/E and WCW. Ramon is also known as Scott Hall, his real and WCW name.

name: Andr the Giant
deck: Famous for his enormous size and strength, the late Andr "the Giant" Roussimoff was a particularly beloved WWF wrestler who also appeared in many video games, continuing to be included in game rosters for years after his death. These include WWF Superstars and Wrestlemania on the NES.

name: Bret Hart
deck: Bret Hart is a Hall of Fame WWE Wrestler and 7-time World Champion. He is currently signed to a Legends contract with the WWE and makes sporadic appearances for the company.

name: Trish Stratus
deck: Trish Stratus is retired professional wrestler who held the WWE Women's Championship a record seven times.

name: Brock Lesnar
deck: Brock Lesnar is an American professional wrestler for the WWE. Lesnar is also a retired mixed martial artist and former UFC Heavyweight Champion.

name: Goldberg
deck: Bill Goldberg is a semi-retired professional wrestler as well as an actor. Goldberg has wrestled for many organizations including WCW and WWE.

name: The British Bulldog
deck:
The British Bulldog aka "The Vampire" and "Davey Boy Smith" was a professional wrestler in WWF, WCW and many other leagues.

He won several titles including the WWF Tag Team Champions and WWF European Champion.

name: Jake Roberts
deck: A fixture of late 80s and early 90s pro wrestling, Jake "The Snake" Roberts was featured in many video games. His nickname came from his physique, his ring entrance and his penchant for carrying a pet snake.

name: Dusty Rhodes
deck: The "American Dream" Dusty Rhodes was a legendary pro wrestler famed for his "working man" gimmick. He was a three time NWA World Heavyweight Champion.

name: Viktor
deck: Viktor is a powerful vampire of three elders, his presence is feared and respected and his men are but loyal to him. He has been seen in Underworld, Underworld: Evolution and the antagonist in Underworld: Rise of the Lycans.

name: Maryse
deck: Maryse is a model and professional wrestler. She wrestled for the WWE from '06 to '11, leaving to pursue business interests.

name: Dolph Ziggler
deck: The Self-confessed "Show Off" Dolph Ziggler is a current WWE wrestler who has appeared in numerous WWE video games.

name: Big Van Vader
deck: A professional wrestler who has worked in WCW, WWE, NJPW, and more. He's known throughout the world as one of the stiffest, toughest wrestlers to ever hit the ring.

name: Sheamus
deck: Sheamus is a professional wrestler contracted with WWE. Since joining the company he has become a two-time WWE champion with a beard that's red.

name: Goldust
deck: Goldust is an eccentric professional wrestler who has appeared in several WWE and WCW video games over the years.

name: Primo Coln
deck: A professional wrestler who has not only appeared as Carlito's brother Primo but more recently as one half of Los Matadores

name: R-Truth
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand

name: Tyson Kidd
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand

name: Zack Ryder
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand, the Assistant to Smackdown! General Manager, Theodore Long. Zack Ryder is the host of the hit youtube show "Z! True Long Island Story", the Internet Champion & a former US Champion. Woo woo woo, you know it!

name: Luke Gallows
deck: He is a former WWE superstar best known for his gimmicks of Festus and as Luke Gallows in CM Punk's Straight Edge Society. At the start of 2016, WWE signed him back to their rosters alongside his fellow Bullet Club members Karl Anderson, AJ Styles and Shinsuke Nakamura.

name: Alicia Fox
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand

name: Brie Bella
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand

name: Natalya
deck: First ever third generation female wrestler, and member of the legendary Hart familly.

name: Nikki Bella
deck: Currently working for WWE on the RAW brand

name: Lex Luger
deck: Former professional wrestler who has worked for all the top companies in his career

name: Kofi Kingston
deck: Kofi Kingston is a professional wrestler working for the WWE. He is currently a part of the WWE Tag Team Champion stable The New Day alongside Big E and Xavier Woods.

name: Ted DiBiase
deck: Ted DiBiase, Sr. is a retired Hall of Fame professional wrestler, manager and color commentator. Ted DiBiase is best known for his persona as the "Million Dollar Man" Ted DiBiase with the WWF.

name: Drew McIntyre
deck: Drew is a Scottish professional wrestler signed with World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE), where he wrestles as Drew McIntyre.

name: Ricky "The Dragon" Steamboat
deck: Professional wrestler who had what many consider one of the greatest matches of all time with Macho Man Randy Savage at WrestleMania III.

name: Lita
deck: Lita is a former professional wrestler best known for her work in the WWE with The Hardy Boyz & Edge

name: Rob Van Dam
deck: Van Dam is a professional wrestler best known for his ECW & WWE work

name: Stephanie McMahon
deck: Daughter of Vince McMahon, former general manager and women's champion.

name: Rikishi
deck: A semi-prominent wrestler in the early 2000's, Rikishi is the real life cousin of The Rock. He also has a rather large buttocks.

name: Daniel Bryan
deck: Currently working for the WWE and a former WWE World Heavyweight Champion, Former Tag Team Champion with Kane, and former United States Champion.

name: Heath Slater
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Sin Cara
deck: Former WWE superstar now working as "Myzteziz"

name: Epico Coln
deck: Fernando/Epico is a professional wrestler.

name: Jinder Mahal
deck: Professional wrestler who formerly worked for WWE

name: Jimmy Uso
deck: Professional wrestler and member of the Anoai family

name: Jey Uso
deck: Professional wrestler and member of the Anoai family

name: Cesaro
deck: Cesaro is a Swiss professional wrestler working for the WWE and is their current United States Champion.

name: Titus O'Neil
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Seth Rollins
deck: Seth Rollins is a professional wrestler and is a former member of "The Shield."

name: Roman Reigns
deck: Roman Reigns is a current professional wrestler for the WWE and was a member of "The Shield".

name: Dean Ambrose
deck: Dean Ambrose is a professional wrestler for the WWE and former member of the faction that was known as "The Shield".

name: Big E
deck: Master of the 5 count, Big E. is a former NXT champion and secret admirer.

name: Naomi
deck: Trinity is an American Professional Wrestler, actress, model, dancer, and singer. She is signed to WWE, performing on the Smackdown Live! brand under the ring name Naomi.

name: Bray Wyatt
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Darren Young
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Rusev
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Bo Dallas
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Tamina Snuka
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Fandango
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Luke Harper
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Erick Rowan
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE.

name: Xavier Woods
deck: A professional wrestler in the WWE currently signed to the SmackDown brand.

name: Summer Rae
deck: A professional wrestler and star of Total Divas.

name: Curtis Axel
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Sami Zayn
deck: Canadian born professional wrestler currently under contract with the WWE. Formerly known as El Generico on the independent professional wrestling scene.

name: Paige
deck: Paige is a professional wrestler from Norwich, Norfolk, England. She began wrestling professionally at the age of 13. In 2013, she became the first-ever NXT Women's Champion, and in her debut match in WWE, she won the Divas Championship from AJ Lee.

name: Michael "P.S." Hayes
deck: Hayes is a former professional wrestler best known as the leader of the Fabulous Freebirds.

name: Finn Blor
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Emma
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Tyler Breeze
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Kevin Owens
deck: A professional Wrestler.

name: Hideo Itami
deck: Hideo Itami is a real-life professional wrestler, currently working for WWE's NXT show.

name: Neville
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Tatsumi Fujinami
deck: A former professional wrestler.

name: Larry Zbyszko
deck: A former professional wrestler.

name: Alundra Blayze
deck: A former professional wrestler.

name: Bushwhacker Luke
deck: A retired professional wrestler.

name: Bushwhacker Butch
deck: A retired professional wrestler.

name: Konnor
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Becky Lynch
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Bayley
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Ivory
deck: A former professional wrestler best known for her years with the WWE where she was a two time Women's Champion.

name: Tatanka
deck: A professional wrestler best known for his various stints with the WWE.

name: Jimmy Garvin
deck: A former professional wrestler known for being a member of the Fabulous Freebirds.

name: Buddy Roberts
deck: Roberts was a professional wrestler best known as one of the members of the Fabulous Freebirds.

name: Brutus Beefcake
deck: A semi-retired professional wrestler, Brutus is best known for his time with the WWE and WCW.

name: Tye Dillinger
deck: Dillinger is a professional wrestler currently working for the WWE in NXT.

name: Braun Strowman
deck: A professional wrestler.

name: Stan Marsh
deck: Stan Marsh is an animated character from South Park. He appears in various South Park games.

name: Kyle Broflovski
deck: Kyle Broflovski is an animated Character from the television series South Park. He appears in all current South Park games.

name: Eric Cartman
deck: Eric Cartman is an animated character from the popular series 'South Park'. Eric Cartman appears in all current South Park games.

name: Kenny McCormick
deck: Kenny McCormick is an animated character from the popular show 'South Park'. He appears in all current 'South Park' games and is known to be killed/die alot.

name: Butters Stotch
deck: Butters is a fourth grade student at South Park Elementary School in the fictional town of South Park, Colorado. He is an important primary character of the series outside of the four main protagonists.

name: Towelie
deck: The pot smoking talking towel from South Park.

name: Aloy
deck: Aloy is the protagonist of Horizon: Zero Dawn voiced by Ashly Burch.

name: Tails
deck: Miles "Tails" Prower is Sonic the Hedgehog's two-tailed sidekick who was first introduced in Sonic the Hedgehog 2.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
deck: Sonic the Hedgehog is one of the world's most famous video game characters and the mascot of Sega Enterprises Ltd. Sonic was introduced on June 23 1991 with the launch of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. His super speed makes him one of the fastest fictional characters.

name: Knuckles
deck: Made his first appearance in Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and is now a mainstay in the franchise. He also enjoys a friendly rivalry with Sonic and rapping about the places he visits.

name: Dr. Robotnik
deck: Dr. Robotnik, also known as Dr. Eggman, is the antagonist in nearly every Sonic the Hedgehog title.

name: Shadow the Hedgehog
deck: Shadow is an artificially created Hedgehog who never ages. He is able to warp time and space with the use of chaos emeralds and is known as "the ultimate life form" in the Sonic universe. He has the same abilities as Sonic the Hedgehog.

name: Amy Rose
deck: One of Sonic the Hedgehog's sidekicks. She is a pink hedgehog who was first introduced to the series on September 23, 1993. She was not created by the Sonic team.

name: Silver The Hedgehog
deck: Silver is a futuristic hedgehog from the Sonic the Hedgehog series. He made his debut appearance in 2006's Sonic The Hedgehog and has psychic powers.

name: Metal Sonic
deck: Metal Sonic is a robotic Sonic created by Dr. Robotnik and has appeared in various Sonic games and spin-offs.

name: Rouge The Bat
deck: Rouge is a professional treasure hunter and part time spy for the government first introduced in Sonic Adventure 2.

name: Chaos
deck:
Chaos, the Keeper of the Chao, is a principle villian in Sonic Adventure. Brainwashed by Dr. Eggman to collect Chaos emeralds, it soon turns rogue and collects the emeralds for itself.
He appears as a playable multiplayer character in Sonic Adventure 2 as "Chaos Zero".

name: Espio the Chameleon
deck: First appeared in Knuckles' Chaotix, and has appeared in a few more games since then. One of the more prominent members of the Chaotix.

name: Charmy Bee
deck: Meet Charmy Bee, the youngest member of the Chaotix team.

name: E-123 Omega
deck: The last of the E-100 series of robots, created by Dr. Eggman.

name: Vector the Crocodile
deck: Vector the Crocodile is a character that features in several games of the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. He is a member of Chaotix.

name: Zavok
deck: The leader of the Deadly Six.

name: Orbot
deck: One of Dr. Eggman's robots. He is very snide and sarcastic.

name: Satan
deck: Satan is the Devil, the incarnation of Evil in the universe, the Lord of Hell, the Prince of Darkness, and a very prominent figure in the Abrahamic religions. Naturally, he appears in many videogames, often as a final boss or last encounter. He is commonly depicted as a tempter that leads the faithful astray, and it's generally a bad idea to trust him.

name: Cuphead
deck: The eponymous star of Cuphead. In deep to the Devil.

name: Sebastian Castellanos
deck: A detective and the playable protagonist of The Evil Within.

name: Gollum
deck: Gollum was once a hobbit who rediscovered the ring of power and was corrupted by it's evil

name: Galadriel
deck: Known as the Lady of Lrien. Galadriel helps Frodo and the fellowship in their journey.

name: Ratbag
deck: Ratbag is a conniving Uruk that allies himself with Talion in Shadow of Mordor.

name: Ivory Lavender
deck: One of the main protagonists in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: PAT
deck: One of the main protagonists in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: Taika
deck: The animal companion of Ive in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: Olia Alagbato
deck: One of the main protagonists in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: Gnart Tigermoth
deck: One of the main protagonists in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: Amon Barros
deck: One of the main protagonists in Earthlock: Festival of Magic.

name: Yoda
deck: Yoda is one of the most powerful Jedi Masters to have ever lived. He is easily recognized by his short stature, green skin, pointy ears, and speech patterns.

name: Darth Vader
deck: Once known as Anakin Skywalker, Darth Vader is a Jedi-turned-Sith, and the iconic villain in the Star Wars saga. He was feared throughout the cosmos as the merciless enforcer of the totalitarian ruler of the Galaxy, Emperor Palpatine. You really don't wanna mess with him.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
deck: A powerful Jedi who goes from being an Apprentice to the late Qui-Gon Jinn to Luke Skywalker's mentor.

name: Darth Maul
deck: Darth Maul is a Villain from the Star Wars series. He appears in numerous games including Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menace.

name: Luke Skywalker
deck: The son of Anakin and Padme, Luke Skywalker is thrust into the Rebel uprising by "Ben" Kenobi and becomes one of the last Jedi Knights after his training with Yoda. Luke is the main protagonist in the Original Star Wars trilogy.

name: Boba Fett
deck: Originally introduced in Star Wars: Empire Strikes Back, this legendary bounty hunter has appeared in a slew of games and is undeniably awesome.

name: Lando Calrissian
deck: First seen in the movie Empire Strikes Back, smuggler turned businessman Lando becomes a key player in the events of the Star Wars galaxy.

name: Jabba The Hutt
deck: The character's role in Star Wars is primarily antagonistic. He is a 600-year-old Hutt crime lord and gangster who employs a retinue of criminals, bounty hunters, smugglers, assassins, and bodyguards to operate his criminal empire.

name: Emperor Palpatine
deck: Palpatine is a fictional character in George Lucas's science fiction saga Star Wars. He is known as the Emperor of the Galactic Empire and as the Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Sidious.

name: Jango Fett
deck: Jango Fett was, at one point, the greatest bounty hunter in the Star Wars universe, and he passed all of that knowledge on to his son, Boba. Boba Fett would go on to surpass his father in his chosen trade.

name: Chewbacca
deck: Chewbacca is the most prominent member of the Wookiee species in the Star Wars universe.

name: Asajj Ventress
deck: Asajj Ventress is a Sith assassin appearing in the Star Wars: Clone Wars TV show, movie, and comics. She tries on multiple accounts to kill both Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi.

name: Han Solo
deck: Han Solo was a smuggler and general for the Rebel Alliance, and a very important figure in the Star Wars universe. Han is the husband of Leia Skywalker.

name: R2D2
deck: Astromech Droid belonging to Luke Skywalker, R2-D2 was introduced as a droid originally belonging to the Naboo defense forces.  Also known as Artoo.

name: Mace Windu
deck: Jedi Master during The Rise of the Empire Era, Mace Windu has been a part of a handful of different Star Wars games.

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
deck: Ki-Adi-Mundi was a Jedi during the Rise of the Empire Era. He also made his way into a few Star Wars games.

name: General Grievous
deck: General Grievous was an antagonist from Star Wars Episode III, and features heavily in all Clone-Wars related Star Wars projects, including videogames. He is a cyborg general for the Separatist army who possesses four arms and the ability to wield Lightsabers.

name: Princess Leia Organa Solo
deck: Leia Organa Solo is the daughter of Padme Amidala and Anakin Skywalker and sister to Luke Skywalker. She was raised on the planet of Alderaan as the daughter of Bail Organa and played a key role in ridding the galaxy of the empire.

image.image_tag: All Images, In Movies, Movie/Game/TV Characters, As Princess Leia

name: Padme Amidala
deck: Padm Amidala is the wife of Anakin Skywalker, she has two children named Luke and Leia. Padme was a queen on Naboo, but is currently a senator on the planet Coruscant.

name: Count Dooku
deck: Count Dooku was once a Jedi, but left and eventually formed the Separatist movement. He fought the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars and is secretly the Sith Lord Darth Tyranus. The actor that played Count Dooku/Darth Tyranus is Christopher Lee.

name: Kit Fisto
deck: A member of the Jedi Council in Star Wars, Kit Fisto is a well-known Jedi Master who fought in the Clone Wars.

name: Aayla Secura
deck: A Twi'lek Jedi Master during the era of the Old Republic, and fought in the Clone Wars

name: Dutch van der Linde
deck: The leader of the gang that John Marston, Bill Williamson, and Javier Escuella were in.

name: Arthur Morgan
deck: Is the main protagonist of Red Dead Redemption 2.

name: Rex
deck: The main character for Xenoblade Chronicles 2

name: Chloe Price
deck: Chloe Price is a rebellious and troubled teen who's out to discover the truth behind Rachel Amber's disappearance with her best-friend Max Caulfield.

name: Rachel Amber
deck: 19-year-old missing girl and best friend of Chloe in Life is Strange.

name: David Madsen
deck: He is head of security at Blackwell Academy and is also Chloe Price's step-dad.

name: Victoria Chase
deck: Classmate of Max Caulfield in Life is Strange.

name: Nathan Prescott
deck: A student in Blackwell Academy. He is the troubled son of Sean Prescott, patriarch of the prestigious Prescott family that runs Arcadia Bay.

name: Joyce Price
deck: A waitress at the Two Whales Diner in Arcadia Bay. She is Chloe's mother.

name: William Price
deck: Deceased father of Chloe Price.

name: Frank Bowers
deck: A drug dealer in Arcadia Bay in Life is Strange.

name: Samuel Taylor
deck: A janitor at Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange. He talks to squirrels.

name: B.J. Blazkowicz
deck: B.J. Blazkowicz is an American soldier and the protagonist of the Wolfenstein series.

image.image_tag: All Images, Wolfenstein: The New Order

name: Frau Engel
deck: Frau Engel is the sadistic commandant of the Belica Labor Camp in Wolfenstein: The New Order.  She nearly kills B.J. Blazkowicz on multiple occasions.

name: Anya Oliwa
deck: Anya Oliwa is a Polish nurse who cares for B.J. Blazkowicz during his coma in Wolfenstein: The New Order.  She joins the resistance and acts as a translator and radio operator.

name: Zelda
deck: Zelda is the titular figure of The Legend of Zelda. She is most often depicted as the princess of Hyrule.

name: Link
deck: Link is the iconic protagonist of The Legend of Zelda franchise.

image.image_tag: Official Art, Zelda 1 Official Art, Images, All Images

name: Ganon
deck: The main antagonist and embodiment of evil in the Zelda series, Ganon lusts after the Triforce and the ultimate power it affords its user. He often appears in his less monstrous form, Ganondorf.

name: Epona
deck: The most famous horse in all of gaming; Epona is Link's valiant steed and the fastest mode of transportation in the Zelda games (outside of warping). She can be called to Link's side by playing "Epona's Song" on the Ocarina of Time.

name: Impa
deck: Impa is the caretaker of Princess Zelda and a member of the Sheikah race. Like Link and Zelda, Impa has appeared in numerous incarnations throughout the Zelda timeline.

name: Beedle
deck: An eccentric salesman who travels the world in a number of Legend of Zelda games. He sells many things including arrows, bombs, and bait.

name: Brigo
deck: A character from The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Lightning fast reflexes.

name: Mezer
deck: A vendor in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Buys and sells meat.

name: Rensa
deck: Rensa is a stable master at Outskirt Stable in Hyrule and features in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

name: Hino
deck: Lives at Outskirt Stables in Hyrule. Teaches Link about the Blood Moon.

name: Prissen
deck: A Hylian Treasure Hunter. Often found with his brother Domidak.

name: Domidak
deck: A Hylian Treasure Hunter. Often found with his brother Prissen.

name: Sagessa
deck: Sagessa teaches Link about Elixirs in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. She lives at Dueling Peaks Stables.

name: Hestu
deck: Hestu is a Korok who features in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. He will help Link increase his weapon inventory space in exchange for Korok seeds.

name: Claree
deck: Claree runs the Outfit store in Kakariko Village in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

name: Lasli
deck: Lasli works at the Outfit store in Kakariko Village in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

name: Pikango
deck: Pikango is a character and quest giver in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. He is travelling the world in search of beautiful landscape paintings.

name: Merina
deck: Merina is a Gerudo guard who protects the entrance to Gerudo Town in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

name: Dorrah
deck: Dorrah is a Gerudo guard who protects the entrance to Gerudo Town in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

name: Urbosa
deck: A Gerudo and one of the four Champions from Breath of the Wild.

name: Daruk
deck: A Goron and one of the four Champions from Breath of the Wild.

name: Mipha
deck: A Zora and one of the four Champions from Breath of the Wild.

name: Revali
deck: A Rito and one of the four Champions from Breath of the Wild.

name: Monica
deck: Monica is a main character in Dark Cloud 2.  She is an expert swordswoman, and a princess from the future. Monica uses the blue Atlamillia that is on her right arm.

name: Dark Genie
deck: This is the main villain in Dark Cloud. The Dark Genie is responsible for destroying all of the towns in the game and hiding their collectible segments in the various dungeons. Toan ultimately faces off against the Dark Genie, who proves to be a tenacious villain with three combat phases.

name: Maximillian
deck: Max is the main character in Dark Cloud 2. He attacks with a wrench and yields the red Atlamillia around his neck, which lets him pass on to the future.

name: Emperor Griffon
deck: The primary villain of the Dark Cloud 2 game. He is the reason that Monica goes back in time.

name: Steve
deck: He is a ridepod that Maximillian can ride on. He can be customized with ridepod parts that the player can invent.

name: Senua
deck: Lead protagonist in Hellblade.

name: Lazlow Jones
deck: Lazlow is the host of various radio stations in the Grand Theft Auto series. He has appeared in every game in the series with voice acting since GTA III.

name: Brucie Kibbutz
deck: Brucie Kibbutz is the steroid shooting, overexcited comic relief of Grand Theft Auto IV. He is good friends with the Bellic cousins. He has a vast interest in sports cars as well as car races.

name: Packie McReary
deck: Patrick "Packie" McReary is the first McReary you meet in Grand Theft Auto IV.

name: Michelle
deck: Michelle is the first of Niko's girlfriends, a neat freak who dislikes drinking.

name: Johnny Klebitz
deck: Johnny Klebitz is the leader of the Liberty City biker gang located in Alderney, the Lost Brotherhood. He is the main protagonist of the Lost and Damned.

name: Ashley Butler
deck: Ashley Butler is Johnny Klebitz' ex-girlfriend who has a drug problem with crystal meth and many other unknown drugs

name: U.L. Paper
deck: A representative of a mysterious government agency, he forces Niko Bellic to do his bidding.

name: Rocco Pelosi
deck: A member of the Ancelotti crime family.

name: Michael de Santa
deck: A former bank robber now living under the Witness Protection Program, Michael finds himself returning to a life of crime as a way to maintain both his sanity and his family's luxurious lifestyle. He partners up with Franklin and Trevor, the two other protagonists of Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Franklin Clinton
deck: The youngest of GTA V's three protagonists, Franklin is a repo man for a luxury car dealership. He begins working with Michael as a way to move up in the world.

name: Trevor Phillips
deck: Trevor is a former military pilot, current drug user and all around psychotic. He used to run bank jobs with Michael, and is eager to get back in the game

name: Lamar Davis
deck: Lamar is Franklin's friend. He enjoys living the gang life. He often argues with Franklin, because Franklin wants out of the gang life, and he doesn't agree to the gang related activities that Lamar wants to participate in. Lamar was voted best new character of 2013 by the Giant Bomb crew.

name: Ron Jakowski
deck: Ron is Trevor's friend. He is conspiracy theorist that worries about nearly everything. He feels uncomfortable when Trevor is around.

name: Chop
deck: A dog owned by Lamar who can be found accompanying Franklin throughout Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Amanda De Santa
deck: The wife of Michael in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Tracey De Santa
deck: The daughter of protagonist Michael De Santa, whom she has a very strained relationship with.

name: Jimmy De Santa
deck: The son of Michael in Grand Theft Auto V, he is voiced by Danny Tamberelli.

name: Lester Crest
deck: Lester is a disabled IT specialist that helps out with heist planning.

name: Spider
deck: Spider is a character in Grand Theft Auto V who owns a tattoo shop.

name: Boonie
deck: Bonnie is a tattoo artist who also performs genital piercing in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Chico
deck: Chico is a character in Grand Theft Auto V who had his wife's name tattooed on his arm.

name: Sue Murry
deck: Sue Murry is a candidate who is running for governor in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Jock Cranley
deck: Jock Cranley is a candidate who is running for governor in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Fabien LaRouche
deck: Fabien LaRouche is a yoga instructor in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Duane Earl
deck: Duane Earl is the host of Beyond Insemination on Blaine County's 96.5 FM. He is voiced by Danny McBride.

name: Simeon Yeterian
deck: Simeon Yeterian is a car dealer whom Franklin works for in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Poppy Mitchell
deck: Poppy Mitchell is a celebrity in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: MC Clip
deck: MC Clip is a rapper celebrity in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Miranda Cowan
deck: Miranda Cowan is a celebrity in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Tanisha
deck: Tanisha is Franklin's girlfriend in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Tonya Wiggins
deck: Tonya is an old friend of Franklin's. However, due to her drug use, he is no longer interested in being around her.

name: Isiah Friedlander
deck: Isiah is Micheal's therapist in Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Kim Il Sung
deck: Kim Il Sung was the founder and first president of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

name: Lewis
deck: Lewis is the mayor of Pelican Town, located in Stardew Valley.

name: Marnie
deck: Marnie is a villager in Stardew Valley.

name: Shane
deck: Shane is a villager in Stardew Valley.

name: Jas
deck: Jas is a villager in Stardew Valley.

name: Vincent
deck: Vincent is a villager in Stardew Valley.

name: Toriko
deck: The creature from Team Ico's The Last Guardian.

name: Marth
deck: Marth is the prince of Altea, and the protagonist of the original Fire Emblem.  He is a very just and noble person, both in name and at heart.

name: Lyn
deck: A young girl from the Sacae Plains, Lyn (whose true name is Lyndis) is one of the main lords in Fire Emblem.

image.image_tag: Fire Emblem, All Images, Other Art or Screenshots

name: Caeda
deck: Princess of Talys and pegasus knight that appears in several Fire Emblem games.

name: Anna
deck: Recurring figure in the Fire Emblem series.  She's not a story character, but she often appears to present tutorials or suspend the game.  On rare occasions, she appears as an NPC within the game world itself.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Minerva
deck: A dracoknight and the princess of Macedon that appears in several Fire Emblem games.

name: Navarre
deck: A mercenary and highly talented myrmidon that appears in several Fire Emblem games.

image.image_tag: Character gallery, All Images, Fire Emblem Franchise

name: Tiki
deck: A manakete from the Fire Emblem series.

image.image_tag: All Images, Official Art, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Celica
deck: A priestess of Mila, she leaves on a quest to find out what happened to the goddess.

name: Linde
deck: A powerful mage from Archanea. She inherited the Aura spell from her father.

name: Chrom
deck: The prince of Ylisse, he leads an army against the Kingdom of Plegia.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Lucina
deck: Character from Fire Emblem: Awakening.

name: Avatar
deck: The player's representation in Fire Emblem: Awakening. The Avatar's gender, appearance, and basic parameters can be customized.

name: Owain
deck: An overly-dramatic, theatrical swordsman and the son of Lissa.

name: Cordelia
deck: A Pegasus Knight of Ylisse and childhood friend of Sumia. She is a romantic with an unrequited love for Chrom.

name: Tharja
deck: A Dark Mage from Plegia who joins Chrom's army. She's a sullen woman with a love of casting hexes and a stalker's obsession with the Avatar.

name: Olivia
deck: A character in Fire Emblem: Awakening. Olivia is one of the most talented dancers of the era, but is also prone to stage fright and doesn't like it when people stare.

name: Corrin
deck: Corrin is the male or female player avatar in Fire Emblem Fates. Corrin also appears as a fighter in Super Smash Bros.

name: Azura
deck: Azura is a main playable character and the deuteragonist in Fire Emblem Fates.

name: Hinoka
deck: Hinoka is a playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. She is the second eldest child of the Hoshido royal family.

name: Ryoma
deck: Ryoma is a playable character in Fire Emblem Fates, he is the eldest child of the Hoshido royal family.

name: Camilla
deck: Camilla is a playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. She is the second eldest child of the Nohr royal family.

name: Leo
deck: The Prince of Nohr in the Fire Emblem Fates games.

name: Takumi
deck: A major playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. He is an archer and the third eldest of the Hoshidan royal siblings.

name: Sakura
deck: Sakura is a playable character from Fire Emblem Fates. The youngest of the Hoshidan royal siblings, and a healer.

name: Niles
deck: An outlaw working for the prince of Nohr, Leo.

name: Oboro
deck: A spear fighter and subordinate of Hoshido prince, Takumi.

name: Ellie
deck: Ellie is one of the main protagonists of the video game The Last Of Us, developed by Naughty Dog. She is voiced and mo-capped by Ashley Johnson.

image.image_tag: All Images, Pictures for my profile

name: Joel
deck: One of the main protagonists of Naughty Dog's video game The Last Of Us, Joel is voiced and mo-capped by Troy Baker.

name: Undyne
deck: The fierce captain of the Royal Guard in Undertale.

name: Toriel
deck: The kindly monster guardian of the Ruins and the first boss of Undertale.

name: Asgore Dreemurr
deck: The monster king of the Underground.

name: Flowey
deck: Your "best friend".

name: Asriel Dreemurr
deck: Asgore's only son who died long before the events of Undertale.

name: Papyrus
deck: A puzzle-loving skeleton sentry who lives in Snowdin with his brother Sans and dreams of one day joining Asgore's elite Royal Guard.

name: Alphys
deck: A socially-inept inventor who became Asgore's royal scientist.

name: Sans
deck: A easygoing skeleton sentry who lives in Snowdin Town with his brother Papyrus.

name: Frisk
deck: The child protagonist of Undertale.

name: Chara
deck: A "fallen child" who died long before the events of Undertale.

name: W.D. Gaster
deck: An enigmatic character in Undertale who once served as Asgore's Royal Scientist.

name: Nathan Drake
deck: A self-proclaimed descendant of English explorer Sir Francis Drake, Nathan Drake is the protagonist of the Uncharted series.  He is voiced, motion-captured, and partially inspired by Nolan North.

image.image_tag: All Images, Uncharted 4: A Thief's End

name: Elena Fisher
deck: Elena Fisher is a television documentary reporter, and a protagonist and love-interest in the Uncharted series.  She is voiced and motion-captured by Emily Rose.

name: Crash Bandicoot
deck: Created by Naughty Dog and the title character of Crash Bandicoot, which later launched a franchise, Crash Bandicoot was initially viewed as a mascot for the Playstation and Sonys answer to Mario. Originally starring in a trilogy of plaformers, Crash has branched out to include kart racers and party titles.

name: Victor Sullivan
deck: Victor "Sully" Sullivan is the father-figure and adventuring partner of Nathan Drake.

name: Atoq Navarro
deck: One of the main villains in Uncharted: Drake's Fortune. He is a mercenary hired by Gabriel Roman to help find El Dorado.

name: Eddy Raja
deck: Eddy Raja is the leader of a modern-day band of pirates and is a long-time rival of Uncharted protagonist Nathan Drake. Voiced by James Sie.

name: Gabriel Roman
deck: A crimelord that runs the South American criminal underworld and is the primary antagonist of Uncharted: Drake's Fortune. Voiced by Simon Templeman.

name: Chloe Frazer
deck: Chloe Frazer is a professional treasure hunter and former fling of Nathan Drake's in the Uncharted series. She is voiced by Claudia Black of Stargate SG-1 and Pitch Black.

name: Harry Flynn
deck: Harry Flynn is an English treasure-hunter and past associate of protagonist Nathan Drake. He is portrayed and motion captured by Steve Valentine.

name: Zoran Lazarevic
deck: Zoran Lazarevic is the leader of a secret terrorist society in Uncharted 2, set on beating Nathan Drake to the treasure.

name: Tenzin
deck: Tenzin is a character in Uncharted 2, joining Drake in his adventure about halfway through the game.

name: Katherine Marlowe
deck: The main villain of Uncharted 3 and a descendant of British playwright (and spy for Queen Elizabeth) Christopher Marlowe.

name: Charlie Cutter
deck: Cutter is a supporting protagonist and fellow adventurer who helps Nate, Sully and Chloe stay one step ahead of Marlowe. Cutter is voiced and mo-capped byGraham McTavish.

name: Salim
deck: Protector for Iram of The Pillars, Salim is an honourable knight, a sheikth amongst the arabic tribe that travel across the desert that surrounds the Atlantis of The Sands.

name: Sam Drake
deck: Nathan Drake's older, more reckless brother. Voiced by Troy Baker.

name: Nadine Ross
deck: The leader of the South African security force Shoreline, and the secondary antagonist in Uncharted 4: A Thief's End, serving as a personal body guard for Rafe Adler. She is portrayed by Laura Bailey, who provided the voice and motion capture.

name: Rafe Adler
deck: A partner-turned-rival of Nathan Drake's, Adler is the main antagonist in Uncharted 4: A Thief's End, representing the impenitent thief.  Dedicating over 15 years and millions of dollars towards finding Henry Avery's lost treasure, Adler is a capable treasure hunter with vast financial resources and connections, including a personal private army led by Nadine Ross.  He is portrayed by Warren Kole, who provided the voice and motion capture.

name: Cassie
deck: Cassie is a teenaged character in Uncharted 4: A Thief's End.

name: Fury
deck: The protagonist of the third Darksiders game.

name: Pin*Bot
deck: A Pinball based robot that starred in the eponymous Williams pinball game.

name: Kratos
deck: The main protagonist of the God of War series, Kratos journeys to the ends of the earth in order to bring down the Gods on Mount Olympus.

name: Zitz
deck: He is part of the trio known as the Battletoads. He is said to be the leader.

name: Pimple
deck: He is part of the trio known as the Battletoads. He is the strongest fighter and can be distinguished by his brown color.

name: Rash
deck: Lead toad, formerly Dave Shar, not known for his signature sunglasses

name: The Baz
deck: A playable character in Divekick. Originally known as Zubaz, he is based on a rejected Street Fighter II character, and was put into Divekick via Kickstarter reward.

name: Shovel Knight
deck: Shovel Knight is the protagonist of the game of the same name. A valiant hero out on a quest to rescue his beloved Shield Knight, he shovels well. He shovels *very* well.

name: Atrus
deck: Portrayed by the series co-creator, Rand Miller, Atrus is the main non-playable character throughout the Myst saga. He's an important figure of the D'ni and the father of Sirrus, Achenar, and Yeesha.

name: Sirrus
deck: Sirrus is one of the main characters of the Myst saga. Originally seen trapped inside a prison book, he, along with Achenar, are the general antagonists throughout the story.

name: Achenar
deck: Achenar is one of the main characters of the Myst saga. First seen trapped within a book, he, along with Sirrus, are the general antagonists throughout the story.

name: Catherine
deck: Catherine is one of the main characters of the Myst saga. She is the wife of Atrus, and a native of the Riven age.

name: The Stranger
deck: The unnamed protagonist of the Myst franchise.

name: Two.P
deck: Two.P is one of the enemies from Capcom's Final Fight.

name: Strider Hiryu
deck: A Ninja of the future. Hiryu fights to stop evil and corruption all over the world.

name: Spider-Man
deck: After being bitten by a radioactive spider during a science exhibit unrelated to school, timid teenager Peter Parker becomes the Amazing Spider-Man.  Armed with the ability to climb walls and enhanced strength, Spider-Man uses his powers to fight evil and protect the innocent.

name: Ryu
deck: A wandering martial-artist, Ryu is a master of the fictional fighting style, Ansatsuken, and is one of the main characters in the Street Fighter universe. Only those that have beaten him know his surname.

image.image_tag: Official Art, All Images, Street Fighter

name: Nathan "Rad" Spencer
deck: Nathan "Rad" Spencer is the lead character in the Bionic Commando series. His original name remains unclear with indications towards both Radd and Ladd Spencer.

name: Mike Haggar
deck: Former Pro Wrestler Mike Haggar is the mayor of Metro City and one of the playable characters in Capcom's Final Fight.

name: J
deck: J is an enemy found in Capcom's Final Fight.

name: Chun-Li
deck: The "First Lady of Fighting Games," Chun-Li is a female fighter from the Street Fighter franchise and one of the 8 original characters in Street Fighter II. She hails from China.

name: Dr. Light
deck: Dr. Light is a famed scientist who has a PhD in robotics and made Mega Man and various other Robots.

name: Dante
deck: Dante is the star of Capcom's Devil May Cry series and the son of the Legendary Dark Knight Sparda. He is also the owner of his own business as a demon hunter, stationed at his Devil May Cry shop along with Trish.

name: Chris Redfield
deck: Chris Redfield is one of the first and most recurring protagonists in the Resident Evil series.

name: Frank West
deck:
Frank West is a freelance photographer and the protagonist of Dead Rising.  
He's covered wars, ya know.

name: The Hulk
deck: The Incredible Hulk is a well known Marvel Comics character possessing limitless strength and endurance as his rage builds.  Don't make him angry.  You wouldn't like him when he's angry.

name: Eddie Brock
deck: Eddie Brock is a character in the Marvel Universe best known as Venom. He became Venom when he was joined with an alien symbiote life form and was one of the most fearsome enemies of Spider-Man. He had become Anti-Venom but recently lost the symbiote in the Spider-Island story arc and later became Toxin.

name: Zero
deck: Mega Man X's mentor and partner who later starred in his own series.

image.image_tag: character art, Official Artwork, All Images

name: Iron Man
deck: Billionaire playboy. Philanthropist.  Alcoholic. Super hero.  The Invincible Iron Man.

name: Captain America
deck: Captain America (Steve Rogers) is a superhero from Marvel comics. The only success of the United States' Super Soldier program, Rogers fought in World War II until he crashed a plane into the Arctic. There his body was left frozen in suspended animation until being revived in the modern day.

name: Mega Man X
deck: Mega Man X was created by Dr. Light to help defend the world after he and Mega Man were gone. He awakes 100 years after his creation and must fight a new evil, Sigma.

name: Sigma
deck: Sigma is the main antagonist in the Mega Man X series. He is almost always found to be the final boss in the games.

name: Jedah Dohma
deck: Jedah is a demon in Capcom's Darkstalkers series. Some of his attacks involve self mutilation, making him one of the goriest fighting game characters.

image.image_tag: Concept Art, All Images, Official Art

name: Ghost Rider
deck: Ghost Rider is the name of several supernatural heroes that use chains as weapons and ride a mystical motorcycle. The Ghost Rider came about because he (Johnny Blaze) made a deal with Mephisto and he becomes bonded with a demon.

name: Firebrand
deck: Known as Red Arremer in Japan, this notorious enemy character from the Ghosts 'n Goblins franchise also stars in his own spin-off series, as well as making many other cameo appearances in Capcom games.

name: Morrigan Aensland
deck: The succubus ruler of Makai that made her first appearance in Darkstalkers, and has since appeared in a number of other Capcom fighting games.

name: Thanos
deck: Thanos is a purple Titan from Marvel Comics. He was a final boss in Marvel Super Heroes and Marvel Super Heroes: War of the Gems, and was a playable character in Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes.

name: Nemesis
deck: Nemesis is the primary antagonist of Resident Evil 3 and is recognized mainly by his scar on his head, his bazooka, and his "S.T.A.R.S." phrase.

name: Black Panther
deck: The Black Panther is Marvel Comic's second modern black superhero and the former lover of Storm. He first appeared in Fantastic Four #52.

name: Black Widow
deck: Black Widow is a former Soviet spy.  She is now on the side of good, working with both S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Avengers.

name: Thor
deck: Thor is the Marvel Universe version of the Norse God Of Thunder.  He is a founding member of the Avengers.

name: Doctor Strange
deck: Doctor Strange Is the current Sorcerer Supreme of the Marvel Universe. He gains his powers from his cape (the cloak of levitation) and his magic amulet (The eye of aggamotto)

name: Captain Marvel
deck: Carol Danvers is a superhero from the Marvel Universe.  She was an Air Force officer who was transformed after having her DNA mutated by a Kree Psyche-Magneton device. Her DNA was merged with that of the Kree hero Captain Marvel, thus granting her the similar powers.

name: Hawkeye
deck: Hawkeye is a member of the Marvel supergroup the Avengers.  He is a skilled archer and fighter.

name: Sir Arthur
deck: Sir Arthur is the knightly hero of the Ghosts 'n Goblins games.

name: Winter Soldier
deck: Once thought to be left for dead in World War II, Bucky Barnes was once Captain America's side kick.  After finding his body, Russian scientists attach a metal arm where Bucky's arm had been severed.

name: M.O.D.O.K.
deck: M.O.D.O.K. is a supervillain from Marvel Comics. His name stands for Mental Organism Designed Only for Killing.

name: Ultron
deck: Ultron is from the Marvel Comics universe. Ultron began his story disguised as the Crimson Cowl.

name: Dormammu
deck: Dormammu is a character from the Marvel Universe.  He was once a human wizard from an alternate dimension, but soon conquered the Dark Dimension and gained unmatched mystical power.

name: Grandmaster Meio
deck: Main antagonist of the Strider series.  Convinced Strider Hien to destroy the Striders who get in his way.

name: Nova
deck: A member of the intergalactic Nova Corps, the New Warriors, and the Secret Avengers, Richard Rider is Nova, the Human Rocket.

name: Rocket Raccoon
deck: Rocket Raccoon is a Marvel Comics superhero, an alien raccoon who's a highly skilled tactician and weapons specialist. He is a founding member of the current incarnation of the Guardians of the Galaxy. He is voiced by Bradley Cooper in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Death
deck: The Marvel Universe's interpretation of the personification of death.

name: Groot
deck: Big tree like alien who is part of the Guardians of the Galaxy. He is known for his trademark phrase "I am Groot" which is also the only thing he can say. He is voiced by Vin Diesel in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Gamora
deck: An adoptive daughter of Thanos. She is played by Zoe Saldana in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. She is playable in Lego Marvel.

name: Ultron Sigma
deck: The fusion of Marvel villain Ultron and Mega Man X foe Sigma.

name: Goku
deck: Goku is the main protagonist in the Dragon Ball franchise and one of the strongest fighters in the universe. He is a Saiyan warrior whose original name was Kakarot, son of Bardock. He is the husband of Chi Chi, and the father of Gohan and Goten. He is also Grandfather to Pan.

image.image_tag: Dragon Ball Z: Burst Limit, All Images

name: Piccolo
deck: Piccolo is a character in the Dragon Ball universe who was originally portrayed as a villain but later became one of Earth's heroes.

image.image_tag: Concept Art, All Images, Video Games

name: Gohan
deck: Gohan is Goku's son and one of the heroes in the Dragon Ball Z universe. He is also the protagonist of the Cell Saga, where he is the first to reach the Super Saiyan 2 form, through immense anger and emotion. In his later Ultimate form, he is considered the most powerful warrior in Dragon Ball Z.

name: Frieza
deck: In the Dragon Ball Z universe, Frieza is one of the first villains to really test Goku.

name: Vegeta
deck: Angry, aggressive, and the self-proclaimed elite Prince of the Saiyans, Vegeta is an incredibly strong Saiyan warrior and Goku's eternal rival. Next to Goku, Vegeta is the strongest Z Warrior on the planet Earth.

name: Cell
deck: Cell is an android constructed from cells taken from various fighters of the Dragon Ball Z universe. He is the main antagonist of the Android Saga of Dragon Ball.

name: Trunks
deck: Trunks is the son of Bulma and Vegeta in the Dragon Ball franchise.

name: Majin Buu
deck: One of Dragon Ball Z's most ferocious and transformation-happy of characters, Majin Buu is the last major enemy in the Dragon Ball Z storyline. With the ability to absorb foes, learn moves, and deliver a serious punch, Majin Buu is one of Goku and friends' most challenging of enemies.

name: Vegito
deck: Goku and Vegeta fuse using the Potara Earrings to become Vegito, the most powerful character in the entire Dragon Ball Z storyline. With the strengths of the two greatest Saiyans, Vegito knows no equal in DBZ.

name: Pan
deck: Daughter of Gohan and Videl, Pan was a main character in the anime Dragon Ball GT, and has since featured in various Dragon Ball games.

name: Future Trunks
deck: Trunks as he is first seen in Dragon Ball Z. He comes from the future to warn the Z fighters about the androids. When Trunks appears his is the youngest person to ever go Super Saiyan.

name: Baby
deck: A machine Mutant Tuffle who was the main antagonist of Dragon Ball GT. He can take control of peoples minds and bodies by entering his victims bodies. He holds a deep grudge against the saiyan race for destroying the Tuffles. He is ultimately defeated by Goku in his super Saiyan 4 form, by being blasted into the sun.

name: The Controller
deck: The Controller is an A.I. construct charged with all administrative duties in Layered.  At the start of Armored Core 3, people have begun to question its rule.

name: Igor
deck: A servant of Philemon, Igor is a recurring character in the Persona series, assisting the player by helping them summon new Personae. He inhabits a realm known as the Velvet Room.

name: Lachesis
deck: Lahkesis is one of the three Sisters of Fate, who determine the destinies of Gods and mortals alike. It is her duty to "embellish" the Threads of Fate, which then determines how a person lives their life.

name: Atropos
deck: Atropos was the Sister of Fate who ended mortals' lives by cutting their thread of life. Many have begged her to let them live, but Atropos is unwavering in her decisions.

name: Clotho
deck: Clotho is the youngest of the three Sisters of Fate and the spinner of the Threads of Fate, deciding where a mortal's life begins.

name: Jack Frost
deck: Jack Frost is a playful demon who can be seen filling all kinds of roles in the Shin Megami Tensei franchise and is also the de facto mascot for Atlus, hee ho!

name: Cerberus
deck: Cerberus is a creature from Greek and Roman myth commonly depicted as a three-headed dog.  It guards the gates of the underworld for the god Hades, preventing those who cross the River Styx from ever escaping.

name: Isis
deck: A goddess in Ancient Egyptian mythology. She is known as the goddess of simplicity, where all things begin.

name: Orpheus
deck: Orpheus was a mortal musician in Greek mythology skilled in playing the harp and writing poetry. When his lover Eurydice died, he ventured into Hades to bring her back from the dead.

name: Thanatos
deck: The Greek personification of death. Though he represents the inevitable for all living things, he was considered a minor spirit and was occasionally outmatched, notably by Sisyphus.

image.image_tag: Concept Art, Official Artwork, All Images, Persona 3/ Persona 3 FES

name: Messiah
deck: A Hebrew term meaning "Anointed One", a messiah is a being--god or human--who is a savior of mankind. Notable messiahs from history and mythology include Cyrus the Great, Jesus, Saoshyant, Kalki, and Maitreya.

image.image_tag: Concept Art, Official Artwork, All Images

name: Anubis
deck: The Egyptian god of the dead, usually depicted as a man with the head of a jackal.

name: Horus
deck: Son of Isis and Osiris, the hawk-headed god of the Egyptians.

name: Lucifer
deck: Lucifer the fallen angel.  Often used as a synonym for Satan; however, they are viewed as separate entities in some video games, and at times even exist alongside each other.

name: Dionysus
deck: Dionysus is the son of Zeus and the Greek God of fertility, wine, and ecstasy.

name: Pyro Jack
deck: Second of the three Jack brothers and one of the most common demons in the Megami Tensei universe. He is also known as the "Jack O'Lantern"

name: Legion
deck: The one who is many. Consists of a nucleus surrounded by a multitude of bodies.

name: Izanagi
deck: Izanagi is the father of creation in Japanese mythology. He was forced to mourn the death of his wife Izanami, but was famously unwilling to accept it.

name: Black Frost
deck: A wicked form of Jack Frost.

name: King Frost
deck: King Frost rules over the entire Jack Frost race. He is powerful and larger than any ordinary Jack Frost.

name: Alice
deck: Alice is a young girl who was raised by her two devil uncles. She has the magical ability to ask people to "Die For Me!"

image.image_tag: All Images, Official Art,  SJ Demon Artwork ...

name: Matador
deck: A demonic matador that appears in the Shin Megami Tensei series and spin-offs.

name: Belphegor
deck: The demon of sloth in Christian tradition. He was famously sent to the mortal world by Lucifer on rumors that humans experienced bliss in marriage; however, he proved it false.

name: Scathach
deck: A female Scottish warrior who instructed Cu Chulainn in the killing and carnal arts in the Ulster Cycle of Irish mythology. Her rival is a competing female warrior named Aife who in some traditions is also her sister.

name: Zaou Gongen
deck: Also known as Kongou Zaou Bosatsu, Zaou Gongen was a Buddhist deity worshipped by a Japanese sect known as Shugendou. The term "gongen" refers to the idea that foreign bodhisattvas were manifesting locally as kami to guide the Japanese to true salvation.

name: Magatsu Izanagi
deck: The Persona of the murderer in Shin Megami Tensei:  Persona 4.  It is a twisted version of Izanagi, the main character's own starting Persona.

name: Baphomet
deck: An image thought to be worshipped by the Knights Templar, the goat-faced demon Baphomet is known today as a Satanic symbol of evil.

name: Vishnu
deck: One of the main triad of Hindu deities who functions as the preserver of the universe. His wife is Lakshmi and he takes the forms of numerous avatars to maintain creation.

name: Nebiros
deck: One of Hell's greatest necromancers, Nebiros holds great sway over deathly rites and divination. He is knowledgeable of animals, minerals, and inflicting pain upon any individual.

name: Decarabia
deck: A Great Marquis in Hell who has thirty legions of demons under his command. He can also turn into birds but mostly appears in the form of a star.

name: Forneus
deck: A Great Marquis of Hell who appears as a sea monster. He has twenty-nine legions of demons and makes the conjurer loved by allies and adversaries alike.

name: Ose
deck: The leopard-formed President of Hell. He imparts the wisdom of the liberal sciences and can make the summoner's enemies delusional.

name: Titania
deck: Titania is the queen of the fairies in English literature. She is often more headstrong than her husband Oberon, but in A Midsummer Night's Dream she is enchanted to fall in love with a common man.

name: Michael
deck: An archangel whose name means and asks the rhetorical question "Who is like God?" He is the leader of God's armies and will defeat Satan at Armageddon.

name: Mother Harlot
deck: Also known as the Whore of Babylon, the Mother Harlot symbolizes the lasciviousness of the Roman Empire and future empires to come. She sits upon a seven-headed beast and is drunk with the blood of the righteous.

name: Mot
deck: The Canaanite god of death, who struggles with the high god Baal and his warrior sister Anat. He defeats Baal every year to usher in the dry season, only for Baal to revive and start the fertile season again.

name: White Rider
deck: The first of the Horsemen of the Apocalypse. He carries a bow and was given a crown, signifying his desire for conquest.

name: Red Rider
deck: The second of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. He carries a sword and will drive mankind to start wars and murder one another.

name: Black Rider
deck: The third of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. He brings famine and weighs its extent with his scales.

name: Pale Rider
deck: The last of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. Death is the rider of this horse and in his wake the suffering of Hades follows.

name: Ganesha
deck: The son of gods Shiva and Parvati in Hinduism. Shiva knocked off his head but replaced it with an elephant's.

name: Barong
deck: The king of protective spirits in Balinese mythology. His eternal enemy is the witch Rangda.

name: Rangda
deck: The evil queen of witches in Balinese mythology. She eternally struggles with Barong.

name: Pixie
deck: Pixie is one of the recurring demons to appear in the Megami Tensei franchise starting with the original Shin Megami Tensei. She is always a low level character who is encountered early on.

name: Silky
deck: Sometimes referred to as "Selkie," this fairy from Irish, Scottish and Icelandic folklore is actually a seal that shed its skin to become human. They can take the forms of maids and clean households, or fall in love with humans.

name: Mithras
deck: The center of a mystery religion in the Roman Empire, Mithras was a god associated with celestial phenomena and was himself born fully-formed from a rock. Of the few specifics and images known about his cult, the most prominent is that of the tauroctony, or bull-slaying.

name: Wu Kong
deck: Wu Kong (aka Seiten Taisei) is a monkey who by force and guile sought to become "The Great Sage of Heaven" as told in the novel "Journey to the West". He has become an exceptionally common character in games since their inception.

name: Arahabaki
deck: God from Japan's old pantheon. In the Megaten games, is a bronze robotic verson of his clay idols from days gone by with a large selection of resistances and weaknesses.

name: Xuan Wu
deck: Xuan Wu is the Chinese celestial animal representing the North. Legends say he was the son of a Chinese emperor who took up Taoism and eventually became a god.

name: Surt
deck: As king of the fire giants in Norse myth, Surt hails from the searing flame world of Muspell. At Ragnarok, he is fated to duel Freyr to the death.

name: Mithra
deck: The Zoroastrian divinity of the covenant, he is one of the three yazatas that pass judgment on the souls of the dead. He has pre-Zoroastrian origins but was entered into its pantheon because of his regional popularity.

image.image_tag: All Images, Art,  SJ Demon Artwork ...

name: Sraosha
deck: Sraosha is the Zoroastrian yazata that conveys the divine messages of Ahura Mazda to humans. He guides souls in the afterlife and possesses a gentle demeanor.

name: Lilith
deck: The first wife of Adam in Jewish lore. She refused to be submissive to Adam in sex, spurring God to banish her from Eden and condemning her to enter the wilderness, where she became a demon and Lucifer's mistress.

name: Orthrus
deck: The two-headed canine brother of Cerberus. Owned by the giant Geryon, Orthrus guarded his precious red cattle before being slain by Heracles as part of his 12 Labors.

name: Mothman
deck: A winged, red-eyed cryptid sighted in the town of Point Pleasant, West Virginia during the 1960's. Its appearance was said to portend the town's bridge collapsing in 1967.

name: Eligor
deck: The 15th demon of the Goetia.

name: Lakshmi
deck: As Vishnu's wife, Lakshmi is the goddess of wealth and prosperity in Hinduism. She emerged from the Sea of Milk as the gods churned it against the evil Asuras.

name: Berith
deck: The twenty-eighth demon of the Goetia.

name: Parvati
deck: Parvati is the wife of Shiva and the mother of Ganesha in Hinduism. She is also the driving energy behind Shakti, the personification of divine female power.

name: Flauros
deck: The sixty-forth demon of the Goetia.

name: Andras
deck: The sixty-third demon of the Ars Goetia.

name: Orobas
deck: The fifty-fifth demon of the Goetia.

name: Baal
deck: A deity of Canaan also known as Ba'al Hadad. Symbolizing storms and fertility, he competes in a solar cycle where he kills the evil god Yam, yet loses to the death god Mot; however, Baal fakes his death and subjugates Mot.

name: Anat
deck: The sister of the Canaanite deity Baal. She is a warrior goddess and tore the death god Mot to pieces after Baal mysteriously disappeared, assuming him to have been killed.

name: Moloch
deck: A god of Phoenicia associated with child sacrifices. The Bible notes that King Solomon built an altar to a god named Chemosh, who is likely one and the same as Moloch.

name: Ishtar
deck: The Babylonian goddess of sex and fertility, derived from the Sumerian goddess Inanna. She had many lovers, all of whom befell curses or death earned from Ishtar herself.

name: Asura
deck: Entities that have different, though usually malicious, roles in Asian religions. These range from being antagonists of the Hindu gods to the three-faced, six-armed depictions of Japanese Buddhism.

name: Ananta
deck: Also known as Shesha, Ananta is a multi-headed serpent whose name means "infinite." He is a servant of Vishnu, who rests on the snake's body and dreams the dream of the universe.

name: Anzu
deck: A bird or bird-like being of Mesopotamian mythology. It stole the Tablets of Destiny, which grant the powers to rule over the universe, from the supreme god Enlil but was in turn slain by Marduk.

name: Apsaras
deck: A demon in the Shin Megami Tensei series. She's a water spirit in the Hindu mythology.

name: Ara Mitama
deck: Mitama represent the four aspects of the human spirit in Shintoism. Ara Mitama is the agressive and forceful aspect of that spirit.

name: Cybele
deck: A Phrygia deity who represents the idea of mother goddess. She appears in the Shin Megami Tensei series.

name: Fortuna
deck: The goddess of luck from Roman mythology. She appears as a demon in Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Fuu-Ki
deck: One of the four Oni from Japanese Mythology. He has the power of wind to blow away his enemies.

name: Girimehkala
deck: A demon from Sri-Lankan mythology, who is thought to be the mount of the demon lord Mara. Also, appears prominently in the Megami Tensei series.

name: Ippon-Datara
deck: A degraded blacksmith god with one eye and one leg, who lives in the mountains of Kumano, Japan.

name: Hua Po
deck: A tree spirit that originates from Chinese folklore. She is said to be formed when three people hang themselves from the same tree.

name: Hariti
deck: A Buddhist goddess who ate others children until Budhha showed her the error of her ways. Appears as a demon in the Shing Megami Tensei series.

name: Hell Biker
deck: A violent motorcyclist turned into a demon. Appears in the Shin Megami Tensei series of games.

name: High Pixie
deck: A high ranking pixie in a leadership role or with significant power. A demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Kaiwan
deck: A god from Assyrian mythology, who is associated with the planet Saturn. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Kali
deck: The Hindu goddess of death, who represents destruction as onset by the ravages of time. Her name means "the black one" and she also serves as a source of empowerment through the feminine concept of Shakti.

name: Kikuri-Hime
deck: In Japanese mythology she is the dragon goddess. She is also the Shinto goddess of negotiation and meditation.

name: Kin-Ki
deck: On of the four oni controlled by Fujiwara No Chikata. His body is so strong that it can't be pierced by any weapon in existence.

name: Kurama Tengu
deck: The most powerful of the Japanese Tengu, who fend off evil spirits and bring good luck. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Kusi Mitama
deck: From Shinto, one of the four aspects of the soul. It brings good luck in health and medicine.

name: Makami
deck: A divine beast that originates from Japanese mythology. They are used to ward off thefts and fires.

name: Melchizedek
deck: Appears as a righteous knight in the Bible. He is known for his wisdom.

name: Mokoi
deck: An evil spirit that originates from Murngin mythology. They kidnap children and eat them.

name: Lilim
deck: Demons from the Jewish folklore. They are the children of Lillith and Samael.

name: Neko Shogun
deck: Originally a prophetic Taoist god know as Mao Shogun. It's name was changed to Neko Shogun due to a translation error.

name: Obariyon
deck: A ghost from Japanese folklore that jumps on peoples backs. It appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Okuninushi
deck: The Japanese god of nation-building and marriage. After abdicating his rule of ancient Izumo province to Amaterasu's grandson, he was given charge over the unseen realm of spirits and magick.

name: Pazuzu
deck: The god of the southwest wind from Babylonian mythology. It brings famine during the dry seasons and locusts during the rainy season.

name: Queen Mab
deck: The fairy queen that originates from Celtic mythology. Appears in Romeo and Juliet and a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Saki Mitama
deck: One of the four aspects of the human soul from Shinto, literally meaning "happy soul." It brings prosperity in hunting and fishing.

name: Nigi Mitama
deck: One of the four aspects of the soul from Shinto. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Sandman
deck: A fairy that has a bag of sand that it throws into peoples eyes, which makes them fall asleep. Originates from German folklore.

name: Sarasvati
deck: A goddess from Hindu mythology of knowledge, music and the arts. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Qing Long
deck: A celestial creature from Chinese mythology. It represents the direction east, spring and the element of wood.

name: Setanta
deck: Originates from Celtic folklore. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Shiisaa
deck: A holy beast that protects houses from evil and grants them fortune. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Shiki-Ouji
deck: A powerful demon from Japanese mythology that could only be summoned by the best mystics who practiced Ying-Yang. It was used to ward off disasters and demons that cause sicksness.

name: Skadi
deck: The embodiment of winter from Norse Mythology. Also known as the Snowshoe Goddess.

name: Sui-Ki
deck: One of the four Oni from Japanese Mythology. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Susano-o
deck: A god from Japanese mythology, who was born along with Amaterasu and Tsukuyomi when Izanagi washed his face of the evils of Yomi. Usually appears as the ultimate Persona of the Fool arcana in the Persona games.

name: Zhu Que
deck: A celestial creature from Chinese mythology. It represents the direction south, summer, and the element of fire.

name: Thoth
deck: A simian lunar deity of ancient Egyptian lore, though he is perhaps more commonly attributed the head of an Ibis.

name: Trumpeter
deck: The angel that sounds the trumpets to mark the apocalypse. Each new trumpet sound will bring a different event or plague.

name: Vasuki
deck: A giant snake that origitinates from Hindu mythology. The gods used him to churn a sea of milk.

name: Yaksini
deck: A demon from Hindu and Buddhist mythology. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Yamata no Orochi
deck: The giant snake that fought with Susano-o in Japanese mythology. Appears as a demon in the Shin Megami Tensei games.

name: Yatagarasu
deck: A divine bird with three legs from Japanese mythology. He was sent by Amaterasu to help the mythical first emperor of Japan, Jimmu, establish the Yamato state.

name: Yurlungur
deck: Originates fromAustralian Aboriginal mythology. He is a fertility deity that also controls the weather.

name: Narcissus
deck: A young man in Greek mythology. He withered away gazing at his own reflection.

name: Koppa Tengu
deck: The smaller, weaker of the Tengu. They possess only small amounts of spiritual power.

name: Jikokuten
deck: One of the Four Heavenly Kings, also known as Dhritarashtra. He is guardian of the East.

name: Koumokuten
