deck: One of the Four Heavenly Kings, also known as Virupaksha. He is guardian of the West.

name: Zouchouten
deck: One of the Four Heavenly Kings, also known as Virudhaka. He is Guardian of the South.

name: Take-Minakata
deck: One of the gods sired by Okuninushi. He fought Take-Mikazuchi for control of Japan but lost.

name: Naga
deck: A tribe of snake-like entities in Hindu lore.

name: Dakini
deck: Female deities in Tibetan/Buddhist lore. Appears as a demon in the Megami Tensei series.

name: Raja Naga
deck: Rulers of the Naga, a snake-like race of men. Appear as demons of the snake clan in the Megami Tensei series.

name: Nue
deck: A creature with the head of an ape, body of a raccoon dog, limbs of a tiger, and a tail in the form of a snake. Appears in the story of Yorimasa.

name: Norn
deck: A syncretic manifestation of the three Norns, or fates, in Norse mythology. Named Urd, Verdandi, and Skuld, they are comparable to the Moirae sisters in Greek myth.

name: Nekomata
deck: The spirit of a long-lived cat in Japanese lore. Also known as Bakeneko.

name: Chernobog
deck: Mysterious Slavic deity attributed to foulness. His name literally means "Black God" but most other details about him are speculative.

name: Hecate
deck: The three-formed, chthonic goddess of the lunar cycle in Greek Mythology. She is also heavily associated with witch-craft and sorcery.

name: Onmoraki
deck: A bird-demon of Japanese lore. They are said to appear before negligent monks, shouting the Degeneration Sutra.

name: Hecatoncheires
deck: Primordial giants of considerable strength who took part in the Titanomachy. They were said to have 100 hands and 50 heads.

name: Ame no Uzume
deck: Goddess of dawn and merriment in Japanese myth. When Amaterasu hid in a cave from Susanoo's violent behavior, it was Ame no Uzume's raucous dancing which drew her back out.

name: Kushinada-Hime
deck: Wife of Susano-o in Japanese mythology. She was transformed into a comb by Susano-o and hidden in his hair as he fought the dragon Yamato no Orochi to prevent her from being sacrificed.

name: Bicorn
deck: A demonic horse with two long horns growing on the back of it's head. It was said to kill and devour obedient or good-natured husbands.

name: Baihu
deck: One of the four celestial beasts of Chinese mythology, known as the white tiger of the west. He represents metal and the Autumn season.

name: Sudama
deck: Minor nature spirits of Japanese lore. They were said to make their dwellings in trees and stones.

name: Pisaca
deck: Creatures of Hindu lore who feed on the vice of men. In the Rig Veda, Indra is mentioned to have slain Pisaca and Rakshasa.

name: Kelpie
deck: A supernatural horse who was said to have haunted the many lochs and rivers of Ireland and Scotland. They tend to have water weeds strewn throughout their hair.

name: Choronzon
deck: A shapeshifting demon and dweller of the abyss. He is said to have been conjured in the Sahara desert by Victor Benjamin Neuburg in 1909.

name: Agathion
deck: A familiar spirit utilized by witches, magicians, druids and the sort. They can be sealed within a jar, as well as a talisman or ring.

name: Kumbhanda
deck: A malformed spirit of Buddhist origin. They are functionally related to the Yaksa of Hindu lore.

name: Ariadne
deck: The daughter of Pasiphae by Minos, the king of Crete in Greek mythology. She assisted Theseus in his escape from the Minotaur's labyrinth with a simple ball of thread.

name: Kaguya-hime
deck: The mysterious protagonist of the classic Japanese folktale "The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter". She was found inside the stalk of a bamboo plant and raised by an elderly farmer, though she was originally born in Tsuki-no-Miyako, the capital of the moon.

name: Inugami
deck: A reoccurring demon from the Shin Megami series. Also from Japanese mythology, the name translates to dog god.

name: Asterius
deck: The birth name of the Minotaur of the Cretan labyrinth in Greek mythology. It is also a name given to a Cretan king who too took the form of a bull.

name: Arsne Lupin
deck: The legendary gentleman burglar.

name: Satanael
deck: The prince of the Grigori, dwellers of the fifth heaven, mentioned in the Second Book of Enoch. He was cast down from heaven after aspiring to glory equal to that of the Lord.

name: Kanami Mashita
deck: An idol singer in the Persona series. First mentioned by name in Persona 4, she makes her first actual appearance in game in Persona 4: Dancing All Night. She is the leader of Kanamin Kitchen, and Rise Kujikawa's junior idol.

name: Persona 5 Protagonist
deck: The silent protagonist of Persona 5. As the leader of The Phantom Thieves of Hearts ("Joker"), he and his friends "steal" the hearts of crooked individuals in the Metaverse to change them in the real world.

name: Ann Takamaki
deck: A student at Shujin estranged from her peers, she joins the Phantom Thieves as "Panther" to avenge her abused friend. Her Persona is the beautiful Carmen.

name: Ryuji Sakamoto
deck: The hot-tempered former track star with a grudge against Kamoshida, a co-founder of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts codenamed "Skull." His Persona is the notorious Captain Kidd.

name: Morgana
deck: A cat burglar who guides the Phantom Thieves through the Metaverse after being rescued early on. Insists he is a human despite looking and acting like a cat in the real world.

name: Yusuke Kitagawa
deck: A disciple of the master artist Madarame who later joins the Phantom Thieves as "Fox" after seeing the truth behind his teacher's fame. His Persona is Goemon.

name: Makoto Niijima
deck: Straight-laced Student Council President at Shujin High who tries to unmask the Phantom Thieves, but later joins them as "Queen" after refusing to hide her true feelings. The younger sister of of Sae Niijima.

name: Futaba Sakura
deck: Futaba Sakura is a main character of Persona 5. A child prodigy with extraordinary intelligence and world-class programming skills, she serves as a "navigator" for the Phantom Thieves of Hearts.  Prior to the events of the game, years of physical and emotional abuse cause her to develop a debilitating form of social anxiety, rendering her unable to leave her house.  She is the adopted daughter of Sojiro Sakura.

name: Haru Okumura
deck: Soft-spoken daughter of a wealthy CEO in Japan who joins the Phantom Thieves to take him down after he threatens to trap her in an arranged marriage. Codenamed "Noir."

name: Goro Akechi
deck: A highschool student who moonlights as the "Detective Prince," helping Sae Niijima hunt down the Phantom Thieves.

name: Masayoshi Shido
deck: A charismatic politician favored to be the next Prime Minister of Japan, but quietly runs a conspiracy responsible for the deaths of several people during his rise to power.

name: Sae Niijima
deck: Makoto's older sister and Public Prosecutor working for the SIU in Tokyo. Sae's interrogation of the Protagonist starts the game.

name: Gordon Freeman
deck: Gordon Freeman is the popular and critically acclaimed main character in Valve Software's Half-Life series, and one of most well-recognized examples of the silent-protagonist.

name: G-Man
deck: An enigmatic character of disturbing power, the inhuman G-Man represents an unknown, trans-dimensional organization, and is a major influence on the events in the Half-Life universe.

name: The Nihilanth
deck: The final boss of the original Half-Life, the Nihilanth commanded the enslaved armies of Xen in an invasion of Earth.

name: Riki Naoe
deck: The protagonist of Little Busters!

name: Lucien Lachance
deck: Lucien Lachance is a character in the game The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. Lucien Lachance is a speaker of the Black Hand.

name: Sheogorath
deck: Sheogorath is the life and soul to the expansion pack for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, Shivering Isles. He also has a presence in other Elder Scrolls games as a daedric lord.

name: Mehrunes Dagon
deck: Mehrunes Dagon first appeared in The Elder Scrolls: Arena and is the Daedric Prince of Destruction, Change, Revolution, Energy, and Ambition.

name: Azura
deck: The Daedra goddess of Dawn and Dusk. One of the less temperamental Daedra of the Elder Scrolls series

name: Molag Bal
deck: The Daedric Prince of Corruption rules over the realm of Coldharbour in the Elder Scrolls universe.

name: M'aiq the Liar
deck: M'aiq is a character in both Elder Scrolls III, IV, V, and ESO. In III he was a popular NPC who provided one bit of truthful information, and in IV and V he provides some comic relief for players who have played previous Elder Scrolls games. He is Bethesda's Gary Stu.

name: Clavicus Vile
deck: A daedric prince whose sphere is the granting of wishes. He's accompanied by Barbas, who seems to be the manifestation of Vile's conscience and is the only thing keep this Daedric Prince under a semblance of control.

name: Akatosh
deck: Akatosh, also known as the God of Time, is the chief deity of the Nine Divines. Akatosh and his creation, Amulet of Kings wereresponsiblefor holding back the forces of Oblivion from invading Tamriel. The amulet's loss is one of the central plots of Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.

name: Dibella
deck: Goddess of Beauty, Dibella is but one of the Nine.

name: Tiber Septim
deck: The general who became emperor of all of Tamriel, and the emperor whom all of Tamriel's emperors have since descended from. He is also worshipped as the divine Talos in Skyrim.

name: Hircine
deck: Hircine is the Daedric Prince of the Hunt. He is known as both the Huntsman, and father of the Manbeasts.

name: Jiub
deck: The very first character encountered in The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, Jiub then disappeared, never to be seen again. A rumor in the next game, Oblivion, states that he (referred to as "Saint Jiub") drove the cliff racers from Morrowind.

name: Sanguine
deck: Sanguine is the Daedric lord of hedonism, and appears in The Elder Scrolls franchise

name: Nerevarine
deck: Lord Indoril Nerevar reborn. As the plot in Morrowind progresses, the player finds out more about his/her surprising role in it and reveals facts that will rewrite the history of the Dunmer people.

name: Meridia
deck: Meridia is the Daedric Prince of Life. Her realm is known as the Coloured Rooms.

name: Boethiah
deck: Boethia is the Daedric Prince of deceit, conspiracy, assassination, treason and unlawful overthrow of authority.

name: The Hero of Kvatch
deck: The main character of the Elder Scrolls: Oblivion. The title of hero is granted to the character after s/he saves the city of Kvatch from the Oblivion Gate that has destroyed the city.

name: Hermaeus Mora
deck: An obscure Daedric Prince whose sphere is the past future and the treasures of knowledge and memory.

name: Nocturnal
deck: The Daedric Prince of Shadow, and the patron to all thieves.

name: Dovahkiin
deck: The Dovahkiin ("Dragonborn" in the tongue of the Dragons) is a legendary prophesized hero, a mortal with the ability to use the magic of the dragons, and the protagonist of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Esbern
deck: One of the last surviving Blades, Esbern is one of the mentors to Skyrim's protagonist.

name: Core 1
deck: SSSSPAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCEEEEEE

name: Zenithar
deck: Zenithar is the god of work, commerce and trading.

name: Balgruuf the Greater
deck: Jarl Balgruuf the Greater is the ruler of Whiterun Hold.

name: Proventus Avenicci
deck: Proventus Avenicci is a character in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. He is the steward of Whiterun.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Lydia
deck: The Whiterun housecarl, assigned to the player early in Skyrim.

name: Barbas
deck: The faithful companion to the Daedric God Clavicus Vile in the Elder Scrolls series. Unlike his more homicidal natured master, Barbas is much more docile and willing to help the champion.

name: Golldir
deck: Golldir is a nord warrior found in Skyrim. He is found outside Hillgrund's Tomb during the "Ancestral Worship" quest.

name: Vals Veran
deck: A wizard in Skyrim. He is found in Hillgrund's Tomb doing unspeakable things to Golldir's ancestors.

name: Alduin
deck: The first born of Akatosh and eldest dragon. He is the primary antagonist of Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Arngeir
deck: Arngeir is a member of the Greybeards, powerful monks who study dragon shouts (Thu'um), and mentors the Dragonborn in mastering his/her own Thu'um.

name: Paarthurnax
deck: Leader of the Greybeards and a guide to Dovahkiin in his quest to defeat Alduin.

name: Ulfric Stormcloak
deck: Ulfric Stormcloak is the Jarl of Windhelm and the leader of the Stormcloaks, a faction bent on pushing the Imperial Legion out of Skyrim, and reclaim Talos as part of the Nine Divines.

name: Erandur
deck: Erandur is a Priest of Mara who is trying to help the people of Dawnstar with their nightmares.

name: Meeko
deck: A recruitable companion in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Shadowmere
deck: The unkillable, demonic horse from The Elder Scrolls series

image.image_tag: All Images, PC Screenshots, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

name: Adrianne Avenicci
deck: A female Imperial Blacksmith. She can be found outside her shop Warmaiden's working as a blacksmith during the day.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Ulfberth War-Bear
deck: Ulfberth War-Bear is Adrianne Avenicci's husband. He works at Warmaiden's as shop-keeper.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Farengar Secret-Fire
deck: Farengar Secret-Fire is an advisor of Jarl Balgruuf the Greater. He is also the court wizard of the Jarl.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Images on Farengar Secret-fire, Characters

name: Kodlak Whitemane
deck: Kodlak is the Harbringer of the Companions.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Characters , Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Eorlund Gray-mane
deck: Blacksmith that forges weapons and armor for the Companions at the Skyforge.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Characters , Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Astrid
deck: Leader of the Dark Brotherhood in Skyrim

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters

name: Alva
deck: A woman in Skyrim whose husband is accused of setting his old house on fire and killing his family. She only appears at night and has an interesting way of talking about the other people in the village.

name: Vokun
deck: One of the Dragon Priest in Skyrim. He's found in High Gates Ruins and is a powerful mage.

name: Anska
deck: A mage looking for an ancient scroll in Vokun's tomb.

name: Savos Aren
deck: Savos Aren is the  Archmage of College of Whinterhold. Leader of Winterhold College.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters

name: Aela the Huntress
deck: Aela the Huntress is a member of The Companions The Circle.

name: Grelod the Kind
deck: The cruel owner of the Honorhall Orphanage in Skyrim. She treats the children so bad that they want her dead.

name: Elrindir
deck: A Bosmer and acting innkeeper at the Drunken Huntsman

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Hulda
deck: Owner of the Bannered Mare in Plains district in the city of Whiterun.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Belethor
deck: Belethor, a Breton, is the owner of the store. As a general merchant, he buys and sells everything.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Arcadia
deck: Arcadia is an imperial alchemist who buys and sells potions and alchemical ingredients.

name: Captain Wayfinder
deck: Captain Wayfinder is a ship captain in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Farkas
deck: Twin brother to Vilkas, member of The circle.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Characters , Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Vilkas
deck: Twin brother to Farkas. Member of the Circle

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Characters , Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Vignar Gray-Mane
deck: A Nord warrior who hangs out a lot at Jorrvaskr. Supporter of the Stormcloak rebellion and can become the new jarl of Whiterun.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Characters , Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Jenassa
deck: A female Dunmer ranger for hire. She favors bows.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Anoriath
deck: A Bosmer hunter that is a vendor and part-owner of The Drunken Huntsman.

image.image_tag: All Images, Skyrim Wiki, Skyrim Characters , Characters

name: Saadia
deck: A Redguard woman working at the Bannered Mare in Skyrim who is hiding from assassins after her for betraying her noble family.

name: Abelone
deck: Abelone is a character that appears in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Acolyte Jenssen
deck: Acolyte Jenssen is a character that appears in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Adara
deck: Adara is a character that appears in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Addvar
deck: Addvar is a character that appears in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

name: Tullius
deck: General Tullius is the commander of the Imperial Legion forces in Skyrim sent to put down the Stormcloak Rebellion. The player has the ability to serve under Tullius in the war, or against him if the player chooses to side with the Stormcloaks.

name: Borgakh the Steel Heart
deck: Borgakh is a warrior Orc in one of the Orc strongholds called Mor Khazgur. She is a potential follower and marriage candidate for the main character.

name: Serana
deck: Serana is a major character in the Dawnguard DLC for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and a companion for the player character throughout the expansion.

name: Acilius Bolar
deck: Acilius Bolar is a Imperial solider whom appears in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

name: Addvild
deck: Addvild is a Nord farmer who appears in the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

name: Valerica
deck: Mother to Serana, wife to Lord Harkon, in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim's DLC Dawnguard

name: Brynjolf
deck: Second only to Mercer Frey in the heirarchy of the Thieves Guild, Bryjolf inducts the Dragonborn into the Thieves Guild and provides guidance for him.

name: Miraak
deck: The main antagonist of the Skyrim DLC pack Dragonborn.

name: Lord Harkon
deck: A vampire from the Volkihar Clan who wanted to blot the sun.

name: Isran
deck: Leader of the Dawnguard.

name: Sahrotaar
deck: A dragon who was tamed by Miraak.

name: Mikael
deck: Mikael is a character in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

name: Carlotta Valentia
deck: Carlotta Valentia is a food merchant in The Elder Srolls V: Skyrim.

name: Uthgerd the Unbroken
deck: Nord warrior that spends her time in the Bannered Mare.

name: Vahlok the Jailor
deck: One of the four dragon priests found on Solstheim.

name: Sinmir
deck: Permanent resident of the Bannered Mare.

name: Hamelyn
deck: Hostile bandit wizard in the Honningbrew Basement.

name: Odahviing
deck: Dragon that becomes your ally against Alduin.

name: Thorald Gray-Mane
deck: A Nord and strong supporter of the Stormcloaks. Got abducted by the Thalmor.

name: Mila Valentia
deck: Imperial child that helps her mother, Carlotta Valentia with her market stall.

name: Gregor
deck: Nord warrior who can become your housecarl

name: Commander Caius
deck: Commander of the guard in Whiterun

name: Markus
deck: Carriage driver.

name: Vulthuryol
deck: Dragon found in Blackreach.

name: Sahloknir
deck: Dragon brought from the grave by Alduin

name: Stump
deck: Frodnar's pet dog.

name: Hod
deck: Lumberjack in Riverwood

name: Nazeem
deck: Redguard living in Whiterun known for being arrogant and patronizing to other citizens.

name: Cicero
deck: A jester that keeps watch over the Night Mother's corpse and is part of Dark Brotherhood questline.

name: Brelyna Maryon
deck: A student at the College of Winterhold. She may be willing to travel with the Dragonborn.

name: Baba Yaga
deck: Baba Yaga is an evil witch from Eastern European folklore that appears in a number of games. She lives in a hut with chicken legs and eats children.

name: Erana
deck: This alum of the Wizard's Institute of Technology (WIT) was a half-faerie featured in the Quest for Glory series.

name: Katrina
deck: A vampire in the Quest for Glory series who tries to use the main character to summon a demon named Avoozl.

name: Erasmus
deck: Erasmus is the eccentric, kindly wizard that helps the adventurer along in the Quest for Glory games.  Along with his pet Fenrus, Erasmus plays a pivotal role in the games.

name: Ad Avis
deck: Ad Avis is one of the main antagonists of the Quest for Glory franchise. He first appears in Quest for Glory II: Trial by Fire

name: Bark the Polar Bear
deck: A one-time character that appeared in Sonic the Fighters, he later appeared in Fighters Megamix

name: Bean the Dynamite
deck: A character introduced in (and dropped after) Sonic the Fighters. He throws bombs, apparently.

name: Fang the Sniper
deck: (referred to as Nack the Weasel in America) A character in the Sonic the Hedgehog Games. First appeared in Sonic Triple Trouble.

name: Flicky
deck: The blue feathered hero of the Sega Genesis game: Flicky. The forefather of the bird Flickies that appear in the Sonic games

name: Mecha Sonic
deck: An earlier prototype Robot of Sonic created by Dr. Robotnik that first appeared in Sonic the Hedgehog 2.

name: EggRobo
deck: The EggRobo is one of the badniks featured in Sonic & Knuckles which appears on the Sky Sanctuary Zone. During the Knuckles play through one survives the destruction of the Death Egg and serves as the boss at end of each level.

name: Heavy Shinobi
deck: A ninja-themed member of the Hard-Boiled Heavies.

name: Heavy Magician
deck: The most prominent of the Hard-Boiled Heavies next to Heavy King, she is a magic-casting robot who brings cameos of rarer Sonic characters to the fight.

name: Heavy Rider
deck: A knight-themed member of the Hard-Boiled Heavies who rides her personal Motobug, Jimmy to battle.

name: Heavy Gunner
deck: A member of the Hard-Boiled Heavies who resembles a police robot.

name: Heavy King
deck: The leader of the Hard-Boiled Heavies, a band of Eggrobos transformed by the Phantom Ruby, and co-antagonist of Sonic Mania.

name: Lee Hui-min
deck: The protagonist of White Day, a young man who has recently transferred to Yeondu High School.

name: Han So-yeong
deck: The mysterious young woman that the main character of White Day wants to give chocolates to.

name: Seol Ji-hyun
deck: A timid girl who is So-yeong's best friend.

name: Kim Seong-ah
deck: A paranoid tomboy that followed So-yeong into Yeondu High School along with Ji-hyun.

name: Patches the Hyena
deck: Patches the Hyena is a non-player character in the PS3 game Demon's Souls and its multi-platform successor, Dark Souls. He will sell unique goods to the player.

name: Andre of Astora
deck: A blacksmith in Dark Souls, found between Undead Parish and Sen's Fortress.

name: Fire Keeper
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she tends to the bonfire in Firelink Shrine and allows the player to level up for souls.

name: Ashen One
deck: The player character in Dark Souls III.

name: Ludleth of Courland
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is the only Lord of Cinder that willingly gives himself up to rekindle the First Flame. He can trade unique weapons to the player for boss souls upon receiving the Transposing Kiln.

name: Shrine Handmaid
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is a merchant in Firelink Shrine that offers more wares in exchange for umbral ash.

name: Pickle-Pee, Pump-a-Rum
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, it is an unseen crow that trades all sorts of items to players for very particular objects.

name: Hawkwood
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is an Unkindled that laments his condition and supposed purpose of slaying the Lord of Cinders. He was once a member of Farron's Undead Legion.

name: Emma, High Priestess of Lothric Castle
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she serves as one of the three pillars of Lothric's rule and was Prince Lothric's wet nurse.

name: Greirat of the Undead Settlement
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a thief that can pillage certain areas in the game for items to sell to the player.

name: Yoel of Londor
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a pilgrim from Londor, the land of Hollows. He can draw out the player character's true strength, providing a free level up.

name: Leonhard
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a mysterious masked member of Rosaria's Fingers, urging the player to invade others and pledge allegiance to Rosaria's covenant.

name: Siegward of Catarina
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a wandering knight in search of an old friend to keep a promise.

name: Eygon of Carim
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a temple knight sworn to protect the cleric Irina.

name: Irina of Carim
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is a cleric whose original purpose was to be a Fire Keeper. She sells miracles to players and can read divine tomes to unlock more miracles for sale.

name: Cornyx of the Great Swamp
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a master pyromancer that teaches pyromancy spells and upgrades the player's Pyromancy Flame.

name: Anri of Astora
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, Anri is an Unkindled on a journey with Horace the Hushed to hunt down Aldrich, Devourer of Gods.

name: Horace the Hushed
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is an Unkindled that cannot speak. He journeys with Anri of Astora across Lothric to hunt down Aldrich, Devourer of Gods.

name: Orbeck of Vinheim
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is a sorcerer in search of rare scrolls to study. He teaches sorcery spells to the player.

name: Giant of the Undead Settlement
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he is an archer that fires gigantic arrows on anyone near the white birch tree in the Undead Settlement.

name: Holy Knight Hodrick
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, he was once a holy knight that has gone mad, invading other people's worlds to take a part of their vertebrae and pile it onto a mound.

name: Sirris of the Sunless Realms
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is a knight of an ancient order. She has a promise to fulfill for her grandfather.

name: Rosaria, Mother of Rebirth
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, the Mother of Rebirth allows her followers to be reborn in appearance and attributes.

name: Company Captain Yorshka
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is one of the few surviving gods of old. She has also taken the role as the leader of the Blades of the Darkmoon.

name: Karla
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is a witch that can teach the player dark sorcery spells, miracles, and pyromancies.

name: Yuria of Londor
deck: An NPC in Dark Souls III, she is one of the three founders of the Sable Church of Londor.

name: Iudex Gundyr
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he guards the entrance to Firelink Shrine, awakening when the Coiled Sword is removed from his chest. A small, black mass can be seen pulsating on his back.

name: Vordt of the Boreal Valley
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is a beastly outrider knight of Irithyll that guards the path between Lothric Castle and the Undead Settlement.

name: Curse-rotted Greatwood
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is a gigantic tree that has come to life from all the curses that have been sealed inside it.

name: Crystal Sage
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is a mad wizard and master of crystal sorcery, guarding the path from the Road of Sacrifices to the Cathedral of the Deep.

name: Deacons of the Deep
deck: A boss battle in Dark Souls III, the deacons of the Cathedral of the Deep watch over Aldrich's coffin, with Archdeacon Royce leading them in battle.

name: Abyss Watchers
deck: A boss battle in Dark Souls III, the Abyss Watchers lead Farron's Undead Legion in their war against the Abyss, violently snuffing out any threat that might unleash the darkness. They are bound to one soul as a Lord of Cinder, having collectively linked the First Flame in the past.

name: High Lord Wolnir
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he was once a feared conqueror and ruler of Carthus before succumbing to the Abyss.

name: Old Demon King
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is the last remaining demon that witnessed the creation of Chaos.

name: Pontiff Sulyvahn
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is the leader of the Church of the Deep.

name: Aldrich, Devourer of Gods
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he was once a simple cleric of the Deep that transformed into a ravenous sludge before becoming a Lord of Cinder.

name: Yhorm the Giant
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is the ruler of the Profaned Capital and a Lord of Cinder.

name: Dancer of the Boreal Valley
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, she is an outrider knight of Irithyll.

name: Oceiros, the Consumed King
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is the king of Lothric. His obsession with dragons drove him mad, but not without managing to transform himself into one.

name: Champion Gundyr
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he was a champion that was supposed to link the Fire in another age but was too late.

name: Dragonslayer Armour
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is an animated suit of armor possessed by the Pilgrim Butterfly.

name: Ancient Wyvern
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is one of the few remaining wyverns from long ago that live in Archdragon Peak.

name: King of the Storm
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, it is a feathered drake from the Age of Ancients that can summon storms.

name: The Nameless King
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is a fearsome warrior and ally to the dragons. He rides the King of the Storm into battle and wields the power of lightning.

name: Prince Lothric
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is the cursed prince of the kingdom of Lothric who has shirked his duty as a Lord of Cinder, refusing to link the Fire.

name: Lorian, Elder Prince
deck: A boss in Dark Souls III, he is the warrior prince of Lothric and personal protector to his younger brother. He willingly succumbed to Lothric's curse, leaving him lame and mute.

name: Soul of Cinder
deck: The final boss of Dark Souls III, it is the living embodiment of all the Lords of Cinder that linked the First Flame.

name: Lady Friede
deck: An NPC in the Dark Souls III DLC Ashes of Ariandel, she is the mysterious figure that has persuaded the Corvians of the Painted World to keep the fire from burning and to live in rot.

name: Ariandel
deck: A boss in the Dark Souls III DLC Ashes of Ariandel, he is "Father" to the Corvians of the Painted World and keeps the fire from burning the rot away with his own blood.

name: Slave Knight Gael
deck: An NPC in the Dark Souls III DLCs Ashes of Ariandel and The Ringed City, he is a decrepit, old knight on the search for an Unkindled to show fire to the Lady in the Painted World of Ariandel and pave the way to finding the blood of the dark soul.

name: Vilhelm
deck: An NPC in the Dark Souls III DLC Ashes of Ariandel, Vilhelm is Lady Friede's loyal knight.

name: Darkeater Midir
deck: An optional boss in the Dark Souls III DLC The Ringed City, it is a descendant of the Archdragons, tasked by the gods to control the spread of the dark.

name: Attuma
deck: Attuma, a villain featured in Marvel: Ultimate Alliance.  Primarily a Namor villain, he teams up with Doom's Masters Of Evil.

name: Luke Cage
deck: A Marvel superhero with indestructible skin and steadfast principles. He is currently a member of the New Avengers, since he refused to become part of the Initiative after the events of Civil War.

name: Blade
deck: Half-Vampire and Half-Human, Blade is a vampire slayer. He is the last line of defense against them, he has all of their strength and none of their weaknesses.

name: Doctor Octopus
deck: Doctor Otto Octavius was a scientist who turned to a life of crime, using a set of four flexible mechanical arms originally designed to assist in scientific research and labwork to give himself a major advantage over the police.

name: Nick Fury
deck: Nick Fury is the leader of S.H.I.E.L.D., a government agency that keeps track of superhuman activity.

name: Hobgoblin
deck: The Hobgoblin is a Spider-Man villain.  Roderick Kingsley, a fashion designer with connections to the criminal underworld, became the Hobgoblin when he discovered a cache of weapons and a glider left by the Green Goblin.

name: Mysterio
deck: Mysterio is a villain from Marvel Comics.  He is specifically Spider-Man's enemy. He is recognized by his large fishbowl helmet and his use of illusion.

name: Enchantress
deck: Enchantress is a God Of Asgard and weilds vast magical power

name: Vulture
deck: Vulture is a villain in Marvel Comic's Spider-Man Series. Adrian Toomes created the flight suit and became the Vulture.

name: Iron Fist
deck: The latest in a long line of warriors known as Iron Fist, Danny Rand delivers vigilante justice... sometimes, for a paycheck.

name: Beta Ray Bill
deck: Beta Ray Bill is a character that appears in Marvel Comics. He belongs to a race of creatures called Korbinites.

name: Phantom Rider
deck: There have been several characters in the Marvel Comics universe to have the name Phantom Rider. They changed the name to Ghost Rider when they introduced the motorcycle-riding hero.

name: Black Bolt
deck: Black Bolt is the leader of the Inhumans.

name: Vision
deck: Android created by Ultron, who turned good and helped defeat him.

name: She-Hulk
deck: She-Hulk is a super-heroine in the Marvel universe.  She gained her powers from a blood transfusion with her cousin, Bruce Banner, aka the Hulk.

name: Red Hulk
deck: Red Hulk is just like Hulk. However, while Hulk causes chaos by being savage and unintelligent, Red Hulk is actually evil. He has appeared in The Incredible Hulk the movie game, and also in Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2.

image.image_tag: All Images, Comic Book Characters, Rulk Gaming

name: Spider-Man 2099
deck: Miguel O'Hara was injected with an addictive drug that would kill him if he didn't work for the company supplying that drug.  He tried to cure his addiction by purifying his system on a molecular level but was sabotaged and accidently given spider-like abilities.

name: Howard the Duck
deck: Howard the Duck is a character by Marvel comics.  First appearing in Man-Thing, he eventually spread out and became a cult-favorite character.

name: Loki
deck: Norse God of Mischief, Brother of Thor, Odinson.

name: Ant-Man
deck: Often associated with the Avengers, Hank Pym is a brilliant scientist in the Marvel Universe.

name: Wasp
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Janet Van Dyne is a founding member of the Avengers and the first female member of the team.

name: Klaw
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Ulysses Klaw is a Dutch scientist and archenemy to Black Panther. He has a gun on his arm that turns sound into images.

name: Super-Adaptoid
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Alessandro Brannex is a member of the New Enforcers with the power to shapeshift and adopt others' powers. Though this is the first Super-Adaptoid in videogames, Brannex was the second super-villain to adopt the title.

name: Morbius
deck: Morbius was born with a rare blood disorder. In an attempt to treat himself he was transformed into a living vampire. He has been both a force of good and evil in his time.

name: Grandmaster
deck: The Grandmaster is a mysterious being who enjoys manipulating superhero teams into fighting each other to the death.

name: Crystal
deck: Crystal is a member of the Inhumans and the younger sister of Medusa, Queen of the Inhumans.

name: Ronan the Accuser
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Ronan is Supreme Public Accuser for the Kree and therefore responsible for enforcing the laws and decrees of the Kree Supreme Intelligence.

name: Betty Ross
deck: Girlfriend of Bruce Banner/the Hulk in traditional Marvel Universe lore.

name: Adam Warlock
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Adam Warlock is a synthetic being created by human scientists to become their ideal template for a new race of humans who would one day rule the Earth. However, their superhuman creation rebelled...

name: Nebula
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Nebula was a space pirate who believed that she was the granddaughter of Thanos.

name: Drax the Destroyer
deck: A fairly significant character in Marvel's cosmic universe. He is played by Dave Batista in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Spider-Ham
deck: Spider-Ham is an alternate dimension version of Spider-Man. His real name is Peter Porker, and he makes a cameo in Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions.

name: Miles Morales
deck: Miles Morales is the new Ultimate Spider-Man, after Peter Parker died in a shark-jumping battle with the Green Goblin. He has almost the same exact powers as Peter Parker.

name: Maestro
deck: In a possible alternate future, the Hulk becomes an evil ruler known as the Maestro. Seizing control of a nuclear devastated and superpower starved world, this ages old behemoth is both brains and brawn

name: Surtur
deck: Fire demon lord of Muspelheim and enemy of Thor and Asgard in the Marvel Universe.

name: Hela
deck: In the Marvel Universe, Hela is the Asgardian goddess of death.

name: Flash Thompson
deck: Known for bullying Peter Parker in his high school years, Flash is one of the original Spider-Man characters. Currently, he is the superhero known as Venom.

name: Kang the Conqueror
deck: Marvel Universe villain who aims to reshape his past to save his distant future.

name: Living Mummy
deck: Marvel Universe character who is, quite literally, a living mummy.

name: Man-Thing
deck: Guardian of the Nexus of All Realities in the Marvel Universe.

name: Gwen Stacy
deck: The first love of Peter Parker, Spider-Man.

name: Heimdall
deck: The Marvel Universe interpretation of the guardian of the Bifrost Bridge to Asgard, home of Thor.

name: Squirrel Girl
deck: Marvel Universe character with the power to control squirrels.

name: Stan Lee
deck: Stan Lee is the creator of many of the most famous characters in the realm of comic book characters. He is a character in a few video games as well.

name: Scorpion 2099
deck: Kron Stone is an enemy (and former classmate) of Spider-Man 2099, whose DNA was crossed with that of a scorpion in a lab experiment gone awry. He has also been host to the Venom symbiote.

name: Valkyrie
deck: A powerful Asgardian warrior from the Marvel Universe.

name: Medusa
deck: Queen of the Inhumans in the Marvel Universe. She has full psychokinetic control of her long red hair.

name: Star-Lord
deck: A son of a human mother and alien father who leads the Guardians of the Galaxy. He is played by Chris Pratt in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. He is playable in Lego Marvel.

name: Tactical Force
deck: Tactical Force is a member of Hydra who wears a suit of armor similar to Tony Stark's.

name: Bowman
deck: Bowman is a member of Hydra who dresses and fights like Hawkeye

name: Man-Ape
deck: Man-Ape is a villain who constantly attempts to usurp the Wakandan throne from Black Panther.

name: Max Caulfield
deck: Max Caulfield is a timid, young photographer who discovers the ability to control and rewind time, and finds herself drawn into a mystery by her best friend Chloe.

name: Warren Graham
deck: Warren Graham is a resident of Arcadia Bay and a student attending Blackwell Academy.

name: Mark Jefferson
deck: Mark Jefferson is a photographer and teacher at Blackwell Academy.

name: Kate Marsh
deck: Classmate and friend of Max Caulfield.

name: Vanessa Caulfield
deck: Max Caulfield's mother in Life is Strange.

name: Ryan Caulfield
deck: Max Caulfield's father in Life is Strange.

name: Evan Harris
deck: An art student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange.

name: Sean Prescott
deck: Patriarch of the powerful Prescott family that basically runs Arcadia Bay.

name: Bongo
deck: Bongo was a cat.

name: Justin Williams
deck: A student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange. He loves skateboarding and "getting thrashed".

name: Courtney Wagner
deck: Part of Victoria Chase's mean girls posse and a member of the Vortex Club in Life is Strange.

name: Stella Hill
deck: An art student in Blackwell Academy.

name: Taylor Christensen
deck: She is part of Victoria Chase's mean girls posse and a member of the Vortex Club in Life is Strange

name: Pompidou
deck: Pompidou is Frank Bower's pet dog.

name: Juliet Watson
deck: A student journalist in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange.

name: Alyssa Anderson
deck: Alyssa Anderson is a student attending Blackwell Academy.

name: Dana Ward
deck: A cheerleader in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange.

name: Brooke Scott
deck: Brooke Scott is a student at Blackwell Academy.

name: Luke Parker
deck: A student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange. He prefers to be alone.

name: Trevor
deck: A student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange. He loves skateboarding.

name: Zachary Riggins
deck: Star quarterback of the Blackwell Bigfoots in Blackwell Academy.

name: Hayden Jones
deck: An art student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange.

name: Daniel DaCosta
deck: An art student in Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange, he enjoys drawing more than photography.

name: Ray Wells
deck: Principal of Blackwell Academy in Life is Strange.

name: Monokuma
deck: Main Villain of the Danganronpa series. Headmaster of Hope's Peak Academy, Monokuma is a robotic teddy bear with unlimited replicas and a passion for cruel games.

name: Luigi
deck: Luigi is Mario's brother.  He began as a simple palette swap of Mario, but was later differentiated. In his later forays, he provides comic relief.

name: Skull Kid
deck: Under the spell of Majora's Mask, the Skull Kid is one of Link's greatest opponents.

name: Navi
deck: Link's fairy companion in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Saria
deck: Link's childhood friend from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. After Link's seven year absence she gets captured and awakens as the Forest Sage.

name: King Dodongo
deck: King Dodongo is an infernal dinosaur. He appears as a boss in the game Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Rauru
deck: An old Hylian man who is one of the Six Sages who protect the Sacred Realm in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Darunia
deck: Darunia is the leader of the Goron race and one of the Six Sages, protectors of the Sacred Realm in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of TIme.

name: Princess Ruto
deck: The daughter of King Zora and one of the Six Sages, protectors of the Sacred Realm in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Nabooru
deck: A high ranking Gerudo soldier brainwashed by the sisters Koume and Kotake. awakens as The Sixth Sage in Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of TIme

name: Malon
deck: Lives at Lon Lon Ranch and introduces Link to Epona in Ocarina Of Time.

name: Great Deku Tree
deck: Great Deku Tree is a character who has made many appearances in The Legend of Zelda series.

name: Volvagia
deck: A Lava Dragon that roosts in Death Mountain. It has one weakness: a big-ass hammer!

name: Barinade
deck: The Bio-Electrical Anemone. Also known as the electricity-zapping, tentacle bearing, spike wielding, umm... thing. It's also surrounded by jellyfish.

name: Jabun
deck: Spirit of the ocean and keeper of Nayru's pearl. He was known as Jabu Jabu in Ocarina of Time.

name: Happy Mask Salesman
deck: A mysterious man who has dedicated his life to the collection of rare and unique masks, who runs the "Happy Mask Shop" in Hyrule Castle Town. Former owner of an item of ultimate evil, the Mask of Majora.

name: Kaepora Gaebora
deck: Kaepora Gaebora is the mysterious, wise owl that guides young Link through the first half of The Ocarina of Time.

name: Damp
deck: Damp is the grave-keeper that appears in a few games of the Legend of Zelda series.

name: Dark Link
deck: Also known as Shadow Link, he is a recurring enemy in the Legend of Zelda franchise and is a doppelganger of Link. He first appeared in Zelda II as the final boss.

name: Twinrova
deck: Koume and Kotake are twin witches that team up and merge into a formidable opponent in several Legend of Zelda games. They also appear as friendlies in Majora's Mask.

name: Bongo Bongo
deck: To the naked eye, only a pair of giant hands playing a bongo can be seen. To the eye of truth, however, a beast is revealed.

name: Morpha
deck: Morpha is the boss of the water temple from The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time.

name: Phantom Ganon
deck: Phantom Ganon is a character that appears repeatedly throughout the Legend of Zelda franchise. He usually appears as a test of Link's strength.

name: Fado
deck: Fado is the former Sage of Wind in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker.

name: Gohma
deck: A recurring, one-eyed, arachnid-like enemy/boss in the Legend of Zelda series.

name: Nayru
deck: Considered both the Goddess of Wisdom and the Oracle of Ages, Nayru plays an important and reoccurring role in the Zelda series.

name: Farore
deck: Farore, the Goddess of Courage, is the creator of all Hylian life, and one with the Triforce of Courage.

name: Great Fairy
deck: Great Fairies in hidden caves in the Legend of Zelda series. They can give Link magic spells or special powers, increase his magic meter, upgrade weapons, or can simply be used to completely replenish his health.

name: King Zora
deck: The king of the aquatic people, the Zora's. In Legend of Zelda: the Ocarina of Time, he appears frozen blocking the gate to Lord Jabu-Jabu's Lair.

name: Anju
deck: Anju cares for cuccos despite being allergic. They often escape, and she relies on Link to get them back. In Majora's Mask, she works at the inn and is engaged to her childhood sweetheart Kafei.

name: Mutoh
deck: Mutoh is the head carpenter of the five carpenters. He was entrusted by the King of Hyrule to fix up the town when needed.

name: Postman
deck: Appears in many Zelda titles. Can NEVER be beaten in a race.

name: Mido
deck: Mido is a Kokiri who belittles Link as a child.  He is the boss of the Kokiri.

name: Great Moblin
deck: The Great Moblin is a character found in Link's Awakening, Ocarina of Time, and both Oracles games. He often leads other moblins.

name: Grog
deck: Grog is the outcast son of Mutoh, head carpenter in Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. He is included in the Biggoron Sword sidequest.

name: Ingo
deck: The ranch worker at Lon Lon Ranch in the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. He also makes an appearance in Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons.

name: Talon
deck: Talon is the owner of Lon Lon Ranch. He is also the father of Malon.

name: Pierre
deck: A self-proclaimed "wandering" scarecrow from the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Bonooru
deck: Bonooru is a scarecrow that appears in a few games in the Legend of Zelda series.

name: Biggoron
deck: Biggoron is an unusually massive Goron who occasionally helps Link out.

name: Medigoron
deck: Medigoron, brother of Biggoron, is a giant Goron working as a blacksmith.

name: Bean Seller
deck: The Bean Seller is a Hyrulian character who can be seen sitting down constantly eating his Magic Beans. He also sells string at 10 Rupees.

name: Battler Ushiromiya
deck: A character from the game Umineko no Naku Koro ni.

name: Jessica Ushiromiya
deck: Major character in the Umineko series. Proficient with brass knuckles.

name: Beatrice
deck: The titular Golden Witch from the the Umineko no Naku Koro ni series of Sound Novels. As a thousand year old witch, she holds the titles of Beatrice the Golden and The Endless Witch. She serves as the main antagonist of the series, doing everything in her power in Purgatorio to perform a serial murder ritual which will end in her resurrection.

name: Liquid Snake
deck: Liquid Snake is the leader of the rogue Foxhound unit that captures Shadow Moses in Metal Gear Solid and serves as that game's primary antagonist. Cloned from Big Boss in the Les Enfants Terribles project along with Solid Snake, Liquid's goal is to get the genetic code of his father.

name: Revolver Ocelot
deck: Revolver Ocelot, aka Shalashaska, real name Adam, appears in the the Metal Gear Solid series with often unclear motives.

name: Psycho Mantis
deck: A member of FOXHOUND who is powerful psychic and spiritual medium. The boss fight against him is widely considered to be a classic video gaming moment, and went a long way in establishing Hideo Kojima as an unconventional and creative developer. He is voiced by Doug Stone and Kazuyuki Sogabe.

name: Big Boss
deck: Dubbed "The Greatest Warrior of The Twentieth Century", Big Boss was a soldier who achieved legendary status during the Cold War and later went on to establish the elite U.S. black ops unit FOXHOUND and the military states of Outer Heaven and Zanzibar Land. He was the first main antagonist of the Metal Gear series, and appears as the main protagonist in the prequels.

name: Colonel Volgin
deck: Colonel Yevgeny Volgin is the leader of the GRU, and the secondary antagonist of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater.

name: Master Miller
deck: McDonell Benedict Miller, also known as Kazuhira Miller or Master Miller, is a figure from the Metal Gear Solid series.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Peace Walker

name: Huey Emmerich
deck: The father of Otacon who created the Peace Walker project.

name: Strangelove
deck: A genius AI programmer and researcher who had one-sided romantic feelings for the Boss, and harbours an intense hatred of Big Boss, the man who was forced to kill her.

name: Hideo Kojima
deck: That's right, the mastermind behind the Metal Gear franchise is a recruitable character in Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker and Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain

name: Skull Face
deck: A villain introduced in Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes.

name: Code Talker
deck: An ancient Navajo linguistics expert and parasitologist whose research was stolen and then weaponized by Skull Face. He helps the Diamond Dogs destroy the parasites he was studying.

name: Quiet
deck: An expert sniper and companion of Big Boss in Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain.

name: Lisa
deck: Lisa is a ghost who appears in the Playable Teaser (P.T.) of Silent Hills.

name: D-Horse
deck: Diamond Horse is Venom Snake's horse. It can poop on command!

name: D-Dog
deck: D.D. is a wolfhound who is adopted by Venom Snake and trained by Ocelot.

name: Venom Snake
deck: Venom Snake is the protagonist of Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain.

name: Saber
deck: A powerful warrior of small stature. Resolute, driven, and stoic.

image.image_tag: Official Art, All Images, Fate/Grand Order

name: Rin Tohsaka
deck: The latest in line of the distinguished Tohsaka magus family. Assertive, competitive, and an exceptionally talented and powerful magus.

name: Shirou Emiya
deck: Shirou Emiya is the main character of Fate/Stay Night. His dream is to be a hero of justice.

name: Illyasviel von Einzbern
deck: A German girl who moved to Fuyuki City to represent the Einzbern family in the fifth Holy Grail War. Energetic and playful with friends but ruthless in battle.

image.image_tag: Official Art, All Images, Official art

name: Rider
deck: A loyal and protective Servant. Silent, sultry, and vigilant.

name: Sakura Matou
deck: Shirou's underclassman and neighbor who visits him often to help him with daily chores. Shy, soft-spoken, eager to please, and possesses great inner strength.

name: Archer
deck: A hardened veteran who specializes in a select few skills. His cynical and sarcastic attitude belies his kind nature.

image.image_tag: All Images, Official art, Fate/Grand Order

name: Caster
deck: Caster is a character from the Fate / Stay Night visual novel / anime. A mysterious woman of high stature.

name: Gilgamesh
deck: Considered to be the most powerful Servant. Arrogant, egomaniacal, and megalomaniacal.

name: Lancer
deck: A fierce and speedy warrior who is skilled at wielding a lance. Friendly, laid-back, and has a strong sense of chivalry.

name: Kirei Kotomine
deck: Supervisor of the fifth Holy Grail War and former Executor from the Church. Serious and dignified.

name: Berserker
deck: An immensely powerful Servant who is also nigh-invincible. His Servant class attribute rendered him devoid of rational thought in return for more power.

name: Assassin
deck: Loyal guard to the gates of Ryudou Temple who enjoys sword duels. Soft-spoken, polite, and composed.

name: Shinji Matou
deck: First son of the Matou family and older brother of Sakura. Arrogant and narcissistic but has an inferiority complex.

name: Zouken Matou
deck: An ancient patriarch of the Matou family. Stern, cold, and ruthless.

name: True Assassin
deck: Loyal Servant of Zouken Matou. Silent, dignified, and a highly skilled assassin.

name: Taiga Fujimura
deck: Shirou's neighbor and caretaker. Hyperactive and cheerful but rather clumsy.

name: Souichirou Kuzuki
deck: The History teacher and Rin's homeroom teacher. Stern, stoic, and disciplined.

name: Issei Ryuudou
deck: President of the student council at Shirou's school. A good friend of Shirou but dislikes Rin.

name: Ayako Mitsuzuri
deck: Captain of the archery club but dislikes Shinji. A good friend of Rin.

name: Red Harlow
deck: Red Harlow is the protagonist in the game Red Dead Revolver. He becomes a bounty hunter after witnessing his parents murder.  He has a scorpion emblem burned into his right hand and wears a red bandanna around it.  He tracks down the men responsible for his parent's deaths.

name: Jack Swift
deck: Jack Swift is a secondary character in the game Red Dead Revolver. After being rescued by Red Harlow, he assists Red in tracking down his parent's murderer.

name: Shadow Wolf
deck: Shadow Wolf is a secondary character in the game Red Dead Revolver.

name: John Marston
deck: John Marston is the lead protagonist of Red Dead Redemption. His primary goal is to track down and kill the remaining members of his former outlaw gang so that he may be reunited with his family.

name: Annie Stoakes
deck: A female rancher from Rockstar's Red Dead Revolver. She assists Red Harlow in his quest for revenge after her ranch is repossessed by Governor Griff.

name: Buffalo Soldier
deck: Buffalo Soldier is a Union soldier who helps Red Harlow get revenge in Red Dead Revolver.

name: Leigh Johnson
deck: Leigh Johnson is the Marshal of Armadillo in Red Dead Redemption.

name: Edgar Ross
deck: A Government Agent and the main antagonist of Red Dead Redemption.

name: Andreas Muller
deck: An angry German silver prospector often found at the poker table in Red Dead Redemption.

name: Bonnie MacFarlane
deck: Outspoken and strong-willed daughter of a rancher who serves as the first quest giver in Red Dead Redemption.

name: Seth Briars
deck: Seth was a treasure hunter who was betrayed by his partner, who stole half of the map that leads to their greatest find. Now, he's totally batshit crazy, and spends his time robbing graves and neglecting his emaciated horse.

name: Jimmy Saint
deck: A journalist from Manhattan who travels out west to break a rut he's fallen into with his writing. He normally writes satirical columns before attempting to take a stab at the frontier lifestyle.

name: Nigel West Dickens
deck: Character from Red Dead Redemption.

name: Landon Ricketts
deck: An Old West Legend and ally of John Marston in Red Dead Redemption.

name: Jack Marston
deck: Jack Marston is the only son of John and Abigail Marston.

name: Sam Odessa
deck: Sam Odessa is a character in Red Dead Redemption that is traveling across the dying west in hopes to get to California

name: Abraham Reyes
deck: A Mexican revolutionary who is featured prominently in the game Red Dead Redemption.  Reyes rides by John Marston for a large amount of the game levels

name: Luisa Fortuna
deck: A woman John Marston meets in Mexico during his quest in Red Dead Redemption.  Despite being a simple peasant, Luisa has a strong heart and a will to fight.

name: Abigail Marston
deck: Abigail Marston is a character in Red Dead: Redemption. She is the wife of John Marston and Mother of Jack Marston.

image.image_tag: All Images, Red Dead Redemption Characters

name: Bill Williamson
deck: One of John Marston's ex gang members in the Wild West. Marston is tracked with finding him and taking him down throughout Red Dead Redemption.

name: Irish
deck: A supporting character during the first act of the RDR storyline.

name: Pig Josh
deck: A boss from Red Dead Revolver, and a playable character in the multiplayer of both Revolver and Red Dead Redemption.

name: Nastas
deck: Nastas is a minor character who is tasked to help John Marston, by the government, toward the end of Red Dead Redemption. He is also the only Native American main character featured in the game.

name: Javier Escuella
deck: A member of Dutch's Gang in Red Dead Redemption. Javier helps Bill Williamson escape to Nuevo Paraiso before John Marson can capture them.

name: Herbert Moon
deck: Anti-semitic shopkeeper from Red Dead Redemption.

name: El Seor
deck: From Red Dead Redemption, El Seor is a mule found wandering the South of the Border area. He is also the basic mount players start with in multiplayer.

name: Ugly Chris
deck: A boss from Red Dead Revolver, and a playable character in the multiplayer of both Revolver and Red Dead Redemption.

name: Colonel Allende
deck: Colonel Allende is a major colonel in the second area of Red Dead Redemption. He is eventually killed by John Marston and Abraham Reyes after a long battle between the Rebels and the Mexican Army.

name: Archer Fordham
deck: Archer Fordham is one of the government agents that forces Marston to do their dirty work before he can see his family again.

name: Uncle
deck: Uncle is an old retired thief who was in charge of keeping John Marston's ranch in shape while he was gone. He didn't do a very good job.

name: Harold MacDougal
deck: A major character in Red Dead Redemption. MacDougal is an author studying Native Americans. He uses cocaine.

name: Vincente de Santa
deck: Vincente de Santa is a major character featured in Red Dead Redemption. De Santa is a Captain in the Mexican Army, serving under Colonel Agustin Allende.

name: Amos
deck: A character from Red Dead Redemption.

name: Drew MacFarlane
deck: A character from Red Dead Redemption. Bonnie MacFarlane's father.

name: D.Va
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. D.Va is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland.

name: Mei
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Mei is a scientist who has taken the fight to preserve the environment into her own hands.

name: Genji
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. The cyborg Genji Shimada has made peace with the augmented body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.

name: Roadhog
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Roadhog is a ruthless killer with a well-earned reputation for cruelty and wanton destruction.

name: Junkrat
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed freak who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

name: Lcio
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Lcio is an international celebrity who inspires social change through his music and actions.

name: Soldier: 76
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Currently the target of an international manhunt, the vigilante known as Soldier: 76 wages a personal war to expose the truth behind Overwatch's collapse.

name: Zarya
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women, a celebrated athlete who sacrificed personal glory to protect her family, friends, and country in a time of war.

name: McCree
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, the outlaw Jesse McCree doles out justice on his own terms.

name: Tracer
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

name: Reaper
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Some speak of a black-robed terrorist known only as the Reaper. His identity and motives are a mystery. What is known is that where he appears, death follows.

name: Widowmaker
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse.

name: Winston
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston is a brilliant scientist and a champion for humanity's potential.

name: Pharah
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Fareeha Amari's commitment to duty runs in her blood. She comes from a long line of highly decorated soldiers and burns with the desire to serve with honor.

name: Reinhardt
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Reinhardt Wilhelm styles himself as a champion of a bygone age, who lives by the knightly codes of valor, justice, and courage.

name: Symmetra
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Symmetra literally bends reality. By manipulating hard-light constructs, she crafts the world as she wishes it to be, in hopes of engineering a perfect society.

name: Torbjrn
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjrn Lindholm.

name: Bastion
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Once a frontline combatant in the devastating Omnic Crisis, this curious Bastion unit now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity.

name: Hanzo
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Mastering his skills as a bowman and an assassin, Hanzo Shimada strives to prove himself as a warrior without peer.

name: Mercy
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Dr. Angela Ziegler is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace.

name: Zenyatta
deck: Playable character in Overwatch. Zenyatta is an omnic monk who wanders the world in search of spiritual enlightenment. It is said that those who cross his path are never the same again.

name: Ana
deck: A battle-hardened supportive sniper in Overwatch and one of the founding members of the original Overwatch group.

name: Sombra
deck: A playable character in Overwatch, she is one of the world's most notorious hackers.

name: Orisa
deck: An OR15 defense robot reprogrammed as the guardian of Numbani in the Overwatch universe.

name: Dopefish
deck: Dopefish was one of the characters that appeared in Commander Keen 4. It has since then done numerous cameo appearances in other games.

name: Doomguy
deck: The "Doomguy" is the space marine protagonist of the legendary Doom franchise. He appeared as a playable character in and was also given the imaginative name "Doom" in Quake 3 and Quake Live.

name: Spider Mastermind
deck: The Commander of Hell's forces in the wake of the phobos incident near Mars

name: Vega
deck: VEGA is a benevolent A.I. that assists the player in DOOM(2016) by providing information/briefings and allowing the player to upgrade his power armor. It is fully sentient and runs the UAC base on Mars.

name: Morgan Yu
deck: Morgan Yu is the protagonist of Prey (2017) and can be male or female depending on the player's choice.

name: Alex Yu
deck: CEO of TranStar Industries and brother of the protagonist Morgan Yu in Prey (2017).

name: Dogmeat
deck: A prime example of man's best friend, Dogmeat is a powerful ally in post-apocalypse America.

name: Vault Boy
deck: The mascot of the Fallout franchise, he has appeared in the franchise as part of game art to illustrate perks and descriptions of other objects in the games and has appeared as the mascot for Vault-tec educational corporate videos. He is a recruitable team member in the game Fallout Tactics.

image.image_tag: Concept Art, Drawn art, All Images, Game Pics

name: Preston Garvey
deck: The leader of the Commonwealth Minutemen living in The Commonwealth.

name: Codsworth
deck: Codsworth is a Mister Handy model robot in Fallout 4.

name: Sole Survivor
deck: The main protagonist in Fallout 4.

name: Sully Mathis
deck: The leader of a small band of raiders in Fallout 4.

name: Gene
deck: A character that players can encounter in the Commonwealth.

name: Jun Long
deck: One of the Minutemen that joins the player in Sanctuary in Fallout 4.

name: John Hancock
deck: A ghoul in Fallout 4 that took the name of the historical figure.

name: Henry Cooke
deck: The owner of the Colonial Taphouse in Diamond City.

name: Darcy Pembroke
deck: Wife of Paul Pembroke in Fallout 4.

name: Conrad Kellogg
deck: A cybernetically-enhanced mercenary working for The Institute in Fallout 4.

name: Arthur Maxson
deck: The Elder of the Brotherhood of Steel.

name: Nick Valentine
deck: An android private detective, and possible companion, in Fallout 4.

name: Shaun
deck: The infant son of the Sole Survivor in Fallout 4.

name: Danse
deck: A soldier and Soldier in the Brotherhood of Stood

name: X6-88
deck: A synth Courser operative for The Institute.

name: Pastor Clements
deck: A pastor located in Diamond City in Fallout 4.

name: Vault-Tec Representative
deck: A non-playable character in Fallout 4.

name: Nora
deck: The female playable character in Fallout 4.

name: Blake Abernathy
deck: A family farmer and owner of Abernathy Farm in Fallout 4.

name: Chancer
deck: The leader of a Raider gang inside of Andrew Station in Fallout 4.

name: Eddie Winter
deck: A notorius criminal in Pre-War Boston in Fallout 4.

name: Connie Abernathy
deck: Wife of Blake Abernathy and co-owner of Abernathy Farms.

name: Zeke
deck: Founding member and leader of the Atom Cats.

name: Justin Ayo
deck: Acting Director of the Synth Retention Bureau of The Institute.

name: Assaultron
deck: A combat robot developed by RobCo and employed by the United States military.

name: Dutchman
deck: A member of the Railroad underground movement, assigned to help rogue Synths escape the Institute.

name: Helena
deck: A member of the underground movement known as The Railroad.

name: Knight Sergeant Gavil
deck: A member of the Brotherhood of Steel, in charge of the supply depot at Boston Airport.

name: Knight Lucia
deck: A member of the Brotherhood of Steel, working in the supply depot

name: Proctor Ingram
deck: Proctor Ingram is Proctor of the Order of the Shield for the Brotherhood of Steel.

name: Cricket
deck: An armament trader in the Boston area of the Commonwealth.

name: Mechanist
deck: A robotics and engineering expert with an army of robots patrolling the Commonwealth

name: Brian Virgil
deck: Brian Virgil was a member of The Institute before he became an supermutant and escaped into the Glowing Sea.

name: Piper Wright
deck: A companion character in Fallout 4. She is a conspiracy theorist and author of the newspaper Publick Occurrences.

name: YoRHa No.2 Type B
deck: The battle android protagonist of NieR: Automata.

name: Toad
deck: The Toad is a member of the Toad species. He is a  loyal attendant of Princess Peach and often assists Mario on his journeys in a variety of ways.

name: Cloud Strife
deck: Cloud Strife is the main protagonist in Final Fantasy VII. He is mostly recognized by his distinct hair style and trademark enormous buster sword.

name: Barret Wallace
deck: Head of the underground resistance movement AVALANCHE in Final Fantasy VII. A tough guy with a good heart. Resembles pop-culture icon Mr. T in both looks and mannerisms.

name: Biggs
deck: Biggs is a recurring character in the Final Fantasy franchise, often along with Wedge to offer comic relief. He is named after Biggs Darklighter, one of Luke Skywalker's wingmen in Starwars Episode IV.

name: Wedge
deck: Wedge is a recurring character in the Final Fantasy franchise, often along with Biggs to offer comic relief. He is named after Wedge Antilles, one of Luke Skywalker's wingmen in Starwars Episode IV.

name: Jessie
deck: Jessie is a member of the anti-Shinra group AVALANCHE.

name: Richard I
deck: Richard I or also known as Richard the Lionheart was a fearless leader, warrior, and commander during Third Crusade. He is also the king of England during his time until his death.

name: Bahamut
deck: The King of Dragons. Bahamut has been a long-time staple for summoners in the Final Fantasy games and is usually one of the most impressive/powerful summons the player can acquire in the game.

image.image_tag: All Images, Card Art, Lord of Vermilion

name: Odin
deck: Odin is the chief god in Norse mythology, presiding over the aspects of war, wisdom, and magic. He learned the secrets of the Norse runes by hanging himself from the branches of Yggdrasil, and is fated to die in the maw of the atrocious wolf, Fenrir.

name: Ifrit
deck: A fire-elemental summon, also known as Jinn, that appears in countless Final Fantasy games.

name: Shiva
deck: A summon that is featured in countless Final Fantasies.

name: Alexander
deck: A summonable creature featured in countless Final Fantasy games.

name: Leviathan
deck: Leviathan is a summoned creature featured in multiple Final Fantasy games, that uses the power of water.

name: Siren
deck: Siren is a Guardian Force featured in Final Fantasy VIII, who deals non-elemental damage to your enemies, and inflicts silence as well.

name: Carbuncle
deck: Carbuncle is a summoned creature featured in multiple Final Fantasy games. His power usually aids your party.

name: Noctis Lucis Caelum
deck: The protagonist of Final Fantasy XV.

name: Stella Nox Fleuret
deck: A main character in Final Fantasy XV. She is described as an "unfortunate" enemy of the protagonist Noctis.

name: Titan
deck: Summonable Earth-type creature from the Final Fantasy series. He resembles a giant and often attacks by throwing large builders or by stomping on the floor.

name: Prompto Argentum
deck: A friend of Noctis from Final Fantasy XV. He is a foreign fugitive who can expertly wield firearms.

name: Regis Lucis Caelum CXIII
deck: Noctis' father from Final Fantasy XV. He is the ruler of Lucis.

name: Ramuh
deck: Major NPC in Final Fantasy IX as well as a summon in the Final Fantasy franchise.

name: Lunafreya Nox Fleuret
deck: Princess of Tenebrae and childhood friend of Noctis.

name: Samus Aran
deck: Samus Aran is the protagonist of the Metroid series. As a bounty hunter, she uses her armored power suit to hunt space pirates and other dangerous forces. She frequently crosses paths with dangerous creatures called Metroids in her adventures.

name: Mother Brain
deck: The final boss of Metroid and Super Metroid.

name: Ridley
deck: One of the most iconic characters in the Metroid series. He is the Space Pirate general, and a recurring boss in the series. Ridley is Samus's arch-nemesis, and killed her parents when she was very young.

name: Metroid Hatchling
deck: A baby Metroid that hatched when Samus was nearby, resulting in it imprinting the belief that she is its mother. In Super Metroid, it is the last known Metroid in existence.

name: Metroid Queen
deck: The most powerful Metroid on SR388 and the final boss of Metroid II: Return of Samus.

name: Steve
deck: The default character in Minecraft and also makes an appearance in the PC version of Super Meat Boy as an unlockable character!

name: Ender Dragon
deck: The boss in Minecraft found in The End.

name: Conan
deck: Conan the Barbarian, created by Robert E. Howard, has been in many games over the years.

name: Adolf Hitler
deck: As the leader of the Nazis, Adolf Hitler has appeared as an antagonist in several video games. Commonly considered the worst person ever, if you get the chance to kill him, you probably should.

name: Altar Ibn-La'Ahad
deck: A highly skilled assassin during the Third Crusade, Altar is the unruly protagonist in Assassin's Creed.

name: Desmond Miles
deck: Desmond Miles is, arguably, the main character of the Assassin's Creed franchise. He is a descendant of Altair, Ezio, and Connor, three of history's greatest assassins.

name: Joan of Arc
deck: A 15th century French heroine that won several important battles in the "Hundred Years' War". Burned at the stake by the English when she was nineteen.

name: Al Mualim
deck: Altair's master and the leader of the Assassins. "Al-Mualim" literally means "The Teacher" in Arabic.

name: Genghis Khan
deck: Founder and Khan (ruler) of the Mongolian Empire, Genghis Khan, united several nomadic Central Asian tribes into becoming the largest land Empire the world has ever seen, through a brilliant, yet brutal, war-driven foreign policy.

name: Gandhi
deck: Influential leader in the Indian Independence Movement promoting non-violent civil disobedience.  Mahatma Gandhi's methods helped lead India to independence from Great Britain.

name: Napoleon Bonaparte
deck: A man with many titles, Napoleon was a French general during the French Revolution that made several significant impacts in European history.

name: George Washington
deck: First President of the United States of America and Commander of the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War, George Washington is often considered the "Father of the United States".

name: Lucy Stillman
deck: Scientist for Abstergo Industries. She is modelled after and voiced by actress Kristen Bell.

name: Winston Churchill
deck: British Prime Minister during World War II and influential figure during the time

name: Leonardo da Vinci
deck: Leonardo da Vinci was a Florentine painter, inventor and scientist. He was born in 1452 and died in 1519. He was most famous for his painting, "Mona Lisa".

name: Queen Elizabeth
deck: Queen Elizabeth reigned as Queen of England for 45 years and is considered one of its greatest monarchs.

name: Alexander the Great
deck: Alexander the Great (356 to 323 BCE) was the king of Macedon, a famous military commander, and the single-handed creator of one of the largest empires ever to exist.

name: Apollo
deck: Apollo is the son of Zeus and Leto, and is the Greek God of music, poetry, medicine, prophecy, and the sun.  He is often known for his physical beauty and is generally seen with his bow and arrows.

name: Nikola Tesla
deck: Nikola Tesla was a Serbian inventor known for his varied and wide-reaching technological innovations. He enjoys building jetpacks and weapons for the Russians in video games.

name: Dante Alighieri
deck: An Italian poet in real life, and a scythe-wielding hero in the game Dante's Inferno.

name: Ezio Auditore Da Firenze
deck: Nobleman of Florence, and the main protagonist of the Assassin's Creed II "trilogy". In Assassin's Creed II, Ezio is on a journey of vengeance. In Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood, he unites Rome against the Templars. In Assassin's Creed: Revelations, he seeks to find out how it will all end.

name: Niccol Machiavelli
deck: Machiavelli was a political scientist who served as an ambassador to Florence in the renaissance era. He is most known for his political work "The Prince".

name: Lorenzo de' Medici
deck: Lorenzo de' Medici was the de- facto ruler of Florence after the death of his father, and patron of the arts.

name: Caterina Sforza
deck: Caterina Sforza lived and ruled during the Italian renaissance.

name: Warren Vidic
deck: Warren is the main antagonist of Assassins Creed and the enemy of Desmond Miles. He is an employee of Abstergo industries.

name: William of Montferrat
deck: One of  Altar's assassination targets, he is the ruler of Acre in the stead of King Richard the Lionheart, between whom there is much animosity.

name: Diana
deck: The Roman goddess of the hunt who is also equivalent to Artemis from Greek mythology. She represents the virtues of chastity.

name: Adam
deck: The first man in Judeo-Christian tradition. Along with his wife Eve he betrayed God's orders and was expelled from the Garden of Eden.

name: Eve
deck: Adam's wife created from his own rib. She was tricked by the snake into eating from the Tree of Knowledge and birthed sin into the world.

name: Rosa
deck: Rosa is a character from Assassin's Creed II. She is a venetian thief with a rather dirty mouth.

name: Shaun Hastings
deck: A member of the Order of Assassins. He helps Desmond recover his ancestor, Ezio's memories.

name: Rebecca Crane
deck: The upbeat tech wiz for the Assassin's Creed. She redesigned the original Animus into the 2.0 version.

name: Subject 16
deck: The rather less fortunate subject of the Animus before Desmond Miles. He left behind a series of puzzles to explain the truth and origins of the Pieces of Eden. He is an Assassin Spy that infiltrated Abstergo.

name: Mario Auditore da Firenze
deck: Mario is Ezio's uncle in the Assassin's Creed games. He helps Ezio recover after his family's loss in Assassin's Creed II. Mario leads a group of mercenaries and owns the Monteriggioni Villa near the Florence District in Italy.

name: Minerva
deck: A member of the First Civilization, preceding humans. She was one of the last members of her species and left behind an important message for Desmond Miles, to be viewed through the animus as part of Ezio Auditore's memory.

name: Rodrigo Borgia
deck: Also known as Pope Alexander VI or 'The Spaniard'. He is the main antagonist in Assassin's Creed 2

name: Giovanni Auditore da Firenze
deck: Ezio's father from Assassin's Creed II. He was an Assassin before being executed by Templars.

name: Grigori Rasputin
deck: The infamous "Mad Monk" of Russia. He is featured prominently in the Devil Summoner games as well as Shadow Hearts: Covenant.

name: Henry Ford
deck: Founder of the Ford Motor Company, and inventor of the Assembly Line which revolutionized the way objects are manufactured.

name: Claudia Auditore da Firenze
deck: Claudia Auditore da Firenze is a noblewoman from the Assassin's Creed franchise. She is voiced by Angela Galuppo.

name: La Volpe
deck: Member of the Assassins in Assassin's Creed II and Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood. He serves as leader of the Thieves Guild.

name: Uberto Alberti
deck: The man who issued the arrest warrant for Ezio, his father, and his brothers. A self taught lawyer he sentenced Ezio's father and brother's to death.

name: Federico Auditore da Firenze
deck: The son of Giovanni and Maria Auditore Da Fierenze and older brother of Ezio, Claudia, and Petruccio.

name: Petruccio Auditore da Firenze
deck: Petruccio is Ezio Auditore's younger brother in Assassin's Creed II. Fond of birds, it is Petruccio who later inspires Ezio to gather the 100 feathers scattered throughout Italy.

name: Maria Thorpe
deck: A Templar who joins Altair.

name: Duccio de Luca
deck: A character from Assassin's Creed who Ezio never got along with.

name: Psyche
deck: A mortal woman of Greek mythology, and lover of Eros, god of love. Aphrodite grew jealous of the girl, having been born with god-like beauty, and sent Eros to cause her to fall in love with a vile monster; though he inevitably becomes infatuated with the girl himself.

name: Cristina Vespucci
deck: Cristina is Ezio's most significant love interest and was considered one of the most beautiful women of Florence.

name: Vieri de' Pazzi
deck: Vieri de' Pazzi is a member of the Templar Order and Ezio's rival.

name: Maria Auditore Da Firenze
deck: The mother of Ezio Auditore, one of the greatest assassins of all time. She is featured in the Assassins Creed franchise by Ubisoft

name: Mars
deck: The Roman god of warfare and counterpart of the Grecian Ares. He was worshiped at the Capitolium alongside Jupiter and Quirinus as part of the Archaic Triad.

name: Girolamo Savonarola
deck: A man who began the Bonfire of the Vanities.

name: Ares
deck: A mythological Greek God. Son of Zeus, brother of Athena, Artemis and Apollo. He is the God of War and is unmarried. In mythology he has an affair with Aphrodite. He appears in many different games, most notably the God of War series.

name: Zeus
