deck: The King of the Gods in Greek mythology, Zeus is the master of the sky. His brothers Poseidon and Hades rule the sea and the underworld, respectively.

name: Hades
deck: A Greek god, brother to Zeus and Poseidon. He is the fearsome yet just ruler of the Greek underworld.

name: Gaia
deck: A primordial deity of Greek mythology considered the personification of Earth. She and Uranas, the Sky, brought forth the greater host of heavenly beings.

name: Poseidon
deck: Poseidon is the son of Cronos and Rhea. When he was born Cronos swallowed him whole and he survived and grew inside Cronos' belly due to his immortality. He grew inside the belly of Cronos with his other siblings until Zeus freed him and his siblings. They then waged war against the Titans.

name: Leonidas
deck: Leonidas was a Spartan king of the 5th century BC. He is famous for his role in defense of Greece during the Persian Wars.

name: Python
deck: The chthonic earth serpent of Delphi. He was slain by Apollo, who took his home and made it into the famous Delphic Oracle.

name: Aegaeon the Hecatonchires
deck: Made a blood oath to Zeus but betrayed him.

name: Megaera
deck: The leader of the Furies.

name: Orkos
deck: A fury who helped Kratos break Ares' ties.

name: Lysandra
deck: Kratos' wife who was murdered.

name: Alecto
deck: Member and queen of the Furies. She is the main antagonist of God of War: Ascension.

name: Tisiphone
deck: Antagonist of God of War: Ascension.

name: Archimedes
deck: Ally in God of War: Ascension.

name: Polyphemus
deck: Multiplayer boss in God of War: Ascension.

name: Stheno
deck: The eldest of the Gorgon sisters.

name: Pollux and Castor
deck: Two conjoined twins who keep the Amulet of Uroborus.

name: Scribe of Hecatonchires
deck: A man who was probably the first person imprisoned inside Aegaeon.

name: Calliope
deck: Kratos and Lysandra's daughter.

name: Village Oracle
deck: The oracle who let Kratos become the Ghost of Sparta.

name: Aletheia
deck: The oracle of Delphi.

name: Skorpius
deck: Antagonist in God of War III.

name: King of Sparta
deck: Ally of Kratos and an illusion made by Tisiphone.

name: Uranus
deck: Primordial Greek deity of the sky.

name: Sora
deck: The spikey-haired protagonist of the Kingdom Hearts series. He is the carrier of Ven's heart.

name: Donald Duck
deck: Donald "Fauntleroy" Duck is a character created by Disney. He is a duck with speech problems, temper issues and strings of bad luck. He appears in series, movies, games and has his own comic book  called "Donald Duck". Recently he has appeared in Kingdom Hearts games, where he assists Sora.

name: Goofy
deck: Goofy is a dog, um... thingy that is friends with Mickey and the rest of the Disney gang. Unlike Pluto, he is actually anthropomorphic.

name: Master Xehanort
deck: The main antagonist of the Dark Seeker Saga in the Kingdom Hearts series.

name: Buzz Lightyear
deck: Buzz Lightyear is a main protagonist from Pixar's Toy Story franchise.

name: Sheriff Woody
deck: There's a snake in my boot!

name: Maleficent
deck: The evil sorceress from Sleeping Beauty. Maleficent is a major antagonist in the Kingdom Hearts series.

name: Pete
deck: Originally Mickey Mouse's arch-enemy, Pete has served as an antagonist in numerous Disney cartoons.

name: Eraqus
deck: Master Eraqus is a Keyblade Master featured in Kingdom Hearts: Birth By Sleep

name: Rex
deck: Rex is a large, green, plastic Tyrannosaurus Rex in the Toy Story movies.

name: Rapunzel
deck: Rapunzel is a Disney Princess.

name: Baymax
deck: Baymax was made by Hiro Takachiho and his brother.

name: Claudia Bernard
deck: Young girl with an impaired leg, she uses the summoning power of the Lantern

name: Eliwood
deck: Eliwood, father of Roy, is the protagonist of "Fire Emblem", prequel to the Japan-only "Fire Emblem: Blazing Sword".

name: Sigurd
deck: Sigurd is the protagonist of Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu and one of the most renowned and beloved characters in the series.

name: Nephenee
deck: Nephenee is a supporting playable character in Fire Emblem:  Path of Radiance and Fire Emblem:  Radiant Dawn.  She's a spear-wielding resident of the Crimean countryside that first fought as a member of a Crimean militia unit until her capture.

image.image_tag: Character gallery, Official Art, All Images

name: Ike
deck: Ike is the main protagonist of Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance and an important character in its sequel, Radiant Dawn. He is also a playable character in the Super Smash Bros. series.

name: Roy
deck: The main lord of the first Fire Emblem game to appear on the Game Boy Advance, Fire Emblem: Fin no Tsurugi.

name: Hawkeye
deck: Hawkeye is a noble-hearted bersker and protector of the sacred Nabata Desert

name: Seliph
deck: The protagonist of the second half of Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu and son of the legendary Sigurd. He seeks to overthrow the Grandbell Empire and take revenge against his father's traitors.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Matthew
deck: Matthew is one of the first men to join Lyndis in her cause. He is a thief and spy that works for the house of Ostia, and a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Priscilla
deck: Priscilla is a young and troubled troubadour from Etruria. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem, and Raven's sister.

name: Raven
deck: Raven is a mercenary who seeks revenge on the house of Ostia. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem, and Priscilla's brother.

name: Rebecca
deck: Rebecca is a young archer and the daughter of the chieftain of one of the many villages in Pherae. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Serra
deck: Serra is a flashy and noisy cleric from the house of Ostia. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Ursula
deck: Ursula is the loyal vassal of Sonia and one of the strongest members of Black Fang. She is one of the boss characters in Fire Emblem

name: Florina
deck: Florina is the youngest of the 3 Pegasus Sisters, and is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Lucius
deck: Lucius is a loyal and pure-hearted monk from Cornwell. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Hector
deck: Hector is the third main character in Fire Emblem, and a childhood friend of Eliwood

image.image_tag: Fire Emblem, All Images, Other Art

name: Bartre
deck: Bartre is a strong but good-hearted fighter from Lycia. He is one of the few non-main characters to be playable in multiple Fire Emblem games.

name: Jaffar
deck: Jaffar is an orphan raised to become a terrible assassin. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Karel
deck: Karel is a wandering swordmaster who lives only to find stronger opponents to confront with. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem

name: Ninian
deck: Ninian is a half dragon who takes the form of a young dancer. She is the older sister of Nils and a playable character in Fire Emblem.

name: Nino
deck: Nino is a 14 year old girl and a talented mage in training. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem.

name: Cecilia
deck: Cecilia is an experienced sage and the ex mentor of Roy. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Clarine
deck: Clarine is a talented trobadour and the second daughter of the counts Pent and Louise. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Fir
deck: Fir is a young girl who travels many lands to hone her skills in swordplay. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Klein
deck: Klein is the heir if the Pent family and general of the Etrurian army. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Lilina
deck: Lilina is the daughter of Hector and a talented young mage. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Nacien
deck: Nacien is one of the 3 wyvern lords of Bern. He is a boss character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Sofyia
deck: Sofyia is a half-dragon girl from Arcadia. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Wendy
deck: Wendy is Bors' sister and the first female knight in the history of Ostia. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi

name: Zephiel
deck: Zephiel is the evil king of Bern and the main nemesis in Fire Emblem: Fuuin no Tsurugi.

name: Eirika
deck: Eirika is the princess of Renais, sister of Ephraim and a main character in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones

name: Ephraim
deck: Ephraim is the prince of Renais, twin brother of Eirika and one of the main characters in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: Seth
deck: Seth is the commander of the Knights of Renais and loyal protector of Eirika and Ephraim. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones. His class is a Paladin.

name: Elincia
deck: Elincia is the princess of the nation of Crimea and a major playable character in Fire Emblem:  Path of Radiance.  She eventually becomes queen and reappears as a playable character again in Fire Emblem:  Radiant Dawn.

name: Soren
deck: Soren is the straightforward mage from the Greil Mercenaries in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance and Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn. He acts as tactician and staff officer for Ike in both games.

name: Mist
deck: A member of the Greil Mercenaries and sister to Ike, her spirit is filled with a large amount of order, allowing her to safely handle Lehran's medallion.

name: Oscar
deck: A steadfast member of the Greil Mercenaries who exudes a calm demeanor and features excellent cooking abilities.

name: Titania
deck: Deputy Commander of the Greil Mercenaries, a senior member of the group who served in the military at one point.

name: The Black Knight
deck: A former student of Greil, he wields the blade Alondite with fearsome skill. He is the sworn nemesis of Ike.

name: Sanaki
deck: The empress of Begnion, the over all leader of the country. She constantly battles with the senate in the political arena.

name: Tana
deck: Tana (or Turner in Japan) is a Pegasus knight who joined the army to fight alongside her beloved brother. She is a playable character in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: Innes
deck: Innes (or Heanius in Japan) is a sniper from Frelia. He is a playable character in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: Amelia
deck: A rather young girl, she recently enters the military to fight for justice.

name: Hector
deck: Hector is the main Protagonist of Castlevania Curse Of Darkness

name: Jagen
deck: Paladin in the service of Altea in several Fire Emblem games.  He protects Marth and helps the prince escape when Altea is invaded.

name: Ogma
deck: Mercenary from Talys that appeared in several Fire Emblem games.  He joins with Marth's forces as the prince leaves to reclaim his homeland.

name: Abel
deck: A cavalier in several Fire Emblem games.

name: Cain
deck: A cavalier that appears in several Fire Emblem games.

name: Deirdre
deck: Deirdre is the wife of Sigurd and the mother of Seliph, Julius and Julia.

name: Maria
deck: A young cleric in several Fire Emblem games.  Maria is Minerva's younger sister.  She was held captive by Grust soldiers, forcing Minerva into following their orders until Marth rescues her.

name: Gordin
deck: An archer in several Fire Emblem games.  In Shadow Dragon, he is captured during the prologue and set as bait for a trap, but Marth frees him.

name: Merric
deck: A mage that appears in several Fire Emblem games.  He is a friend of Marth's that studied magic in Khadein.

name: Camus
deck: A general from Grust, he led the invasion of Archanea.

name: Wrys
deck: An old curate who lives on the island kingdom of Talys.

name: Alm
deck: A young man from the village of Ram, he leads the fight against Prime Minister Dozeh.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Jeorge
deck: A carefree nobleman from Archanea who wanders the continent at his own pace.

name: Clair
deck: A pegasus knight from Sofia who was captured by Prime Minister Dozeh.

name: Athena
deck: A wandering myrmidon who believes she is more than one person.

name: Barst
deck: A militia man from Talys, he dreams of becoming a knight.

name: Catria
deck: A pegasus knight from Macedon, she has feelings for Prince Marth.

name: Draug
deck: A sturdy knight from Altea. He arranged Prince Marth's passage to Talys.

name: Palla
deck: The senior pegasus sister from Macedon. Her loyalty to Princess Minerva is absolute.

name: Luke
deck: A stubborn knight from Altea, member of the 07th platoon.

name: Katarina
deck: A tactician in training, she joins the 07th platoon.

name: Raquesis
deck: The spirited princess of Nodion, she joins Sigurd's army when her territory in invaded by Heirhein.

name: Julia
deck: An amnesic girl from Grandbell, she has the holy blood of Naga flowing through her veins.

name: Eldigan
deck: The lord of Nodion, his loyalty to King Chagall is absolute.

name: Reinhardt
deck: A powerful general from Freege, he serves as a bodyguard to Princess Ishtar.

name: Clive
deck: A knight of Sofia, he leads the rebel army against Prime Minister Dozeh.

name: Olwen
deck: Leader of a squad of knights from Freege, she deeply respects her older brother.

name: Sully
deck: A knight of Ylisse, Sully is a member of the Shepherds.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Frederick
deck: Deputy commander of Chrom's "Shepherds", he is a very serious man whose loyalty is second to none.

image.image_tag: All Images, Concept Art, Fire Emblem

name: Donnel
deck: A young villager who is a master of the plough, somehow he gets involved in the war against Plegia.

name: Lissa
deck: The princess of Ylisse and younger sister of Emmeryn and Chrom.

name: Cherche
deck: A Wyvern Rider and former vassal of Virion.

name: Henry
deck: A sadistic Dark Mage from Plegia who loves war and is always seen with a smile on his face.

name: Lon'qu
deck: Lon'qu is a myrmidon in Fire Emblem: Awakening.

name: Stahl
deck: Stahl is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Awakening. He is a member of the Shepherds, a group led by Prince Chrom that protects the people of Ylisse. He loves food.

name: Virion
deck: Virion is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Awakening. He is the former Duke of Rosanne, a fallen county on the continent of Valm. His talent as an archer is only matched by his reputation as an insufferable womanizer.

name: Nowi
deck: A manakete from Ylisse, she acts like a child to mask her true age.

name: Gaius
deck: Gaius is a thief in the Fire Emblem Awakening video game.

name: Jakob
deck: Jakob is a playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. He will be the Avatar's ally regardless of their route and will join later than usual if the Avatar is male.

name: Felicia
deck: Felicia is a playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. She will be the Avatar's ally regardless of their route chosen.

name: Xander
deck: Xander is a main and playable character in Fire Emblem Fates. He is the eldest child of the Nohr royal family.

name: Veronica
deck: She is the main antagonist of Fire Emblem Heroes. She is a young princess of the Emblian Empire.

name: Sharena
deck: Sharena is a main character and a protagonist in Fire Emblem Heroes. She is a princess of the Askr Kingdom and the younger sister of Prince Alfonse.

name: Alfonse
deck: Alfonse is a main character and protagonist in Fire Emblem Heroes. He is a prince of the Askr Kingdom and a member of the Order of Heroes. He is the older brother of Princess Sharena.

name: Elise
deck: Elise is a playable character from Fire Emblem Fates. The youngest of the Nohrian royal siblings, and a healer.

name: Willis Huntley
deck: A CIA agent on Rook Island who helps the protagonist in Far Cry 3.

name: Ajay Ghale
deck: Far Cry 4's protagonist. An Americanized Kyrati native affiliated with the Golden Path rebel group.

name: Pagan Min
deck: Far Cry 4's psychopathic antagonist. Voiced by Troy Baker.

name: Hurk
deck: Hurk appeared in Far Cry 3 as a mission giver and as a playable character in Far Cry 4 (Co-op mode only).

name: Miriam
deck: Bloodstained: Ritual of The Night protagonist.

name: Gebel
deck: Bloodstained: Ritual of The Night antagonist. Voiced by David Hayter.

name: Jacob Taylor
deck: A Vanguard in the Alliance Navy, Jacob Taylor is one of the few survivors of the Eden Prime massacre. He is the main protagonist of the iPhone game Mass Effect: Galaxy, and is a member of Shepard's squad in Mass Effect 2.

name: Miranda Lawson
deck: A top Lieutenant in Cerberus, Miranda oversaw the Lazarus Project, a project dedicated to bringing Commander Shepard back from the dead. She eventually joins Commander Shepard aboard the Normandy.

name: Ish
deck: A Salarian businessman who frequently deals in shady information.

name: Harold
deck: Harold is an F.E.V. mutant, being exposed to the F.E.V. for an unknown period of time, but strangely, did not complete the process to becoming a Super Mutant. He is the only character to appear in all three main Fallout games.

name: Lucas Simms
deck: Lucas Simms is the sheriff and mayor of Megaton, a town located near Washington, D.C.

name: Vault 101 Dweller
deck: The Vault 101 Dweller (better known as the Lone Wanderer) is the protagonist of Fallout 3. It is this person's mission in the game to find his or her father, who mysteriously left Vault 101.

name: James
deck: James is the father of the Vault 101 Dweller. The whole plot of Fallout 3 revolves around him and his mysterious disappearance.

name: Allistair Tenpenny
deck: Owner of Tenpenny Tower.

name: Micky
deck: Micky is a wanderer who hangs around outside the gate of Megaton. He is constantly begging for purified water. Micky will eventually die if the player refuses to give him water. He could also be killed by giant ants that seem to hang around the entrance to Megaton.

name: Silver
deck: An ex-prostitute and junkie on the run from Megaton's shady saloon owner.

name: Mister Burke
deck: Mister Burke is a character who appears in Fallout 3.  He is a footman for Alistair Tenpenny who offers the player a direct role in the destruction of Megaton.

name: Leo Stahl
deck: Leo Stahl is an NPC in Fallout 3. He works as the bartender of The Brass Lantern in Megaton, and is a Chem addict.

name: Wadsworth
deck: Wadsworth is a witty Mr. Handy maintenance droid found in your Megaton home. He likes to crack corny jokes, and has a jovial British butler personality.

name: Bryan Wilks
deck: Brian Wilks is a resident of Greyditch, and perhaps the only survivor of the Fire Ant catastrophe that has taken place there.

name: Nathan Vargas
deck: A true patriot, and a strong supporter of the Enclave, Nathan spreads the word and waits for the day the Enclave come to restore civilization.

name: Doc Church
deck: The acting doctor of Megaton in Fallout 3.

name: Doctor Lesko
deck: A doctor who accidentally created a new breed of fire ants that ends up killing almost everyone in grayditch.

name: Arkansas
deck: Arkansas is an elderly sniper who is the sole inhabitant of Minefield. He is involved in The Wasteland Survival Guide and the Strictly Business quests.

name: Murphy
deck: A bespectacled Ghoul. He is a Pharmacologist who makes Ultrajet.

name: Flak
deck: A weapons and arms merchant from Rivet City, and a former Slaver. He shares his store with Shrapnel.

name: Jenny Stahl
deck: Jenny is a merchant living in Megaton.

name: Colin Moriarty
deck: The crime boss and saloon owner in Megaton. Speaks with an irish accent.

name: Seagrave Holmes
deck: A merchant in/on Rivet City.

name: Confessor Cromwell
deck: The leader of the Children of the Atom, a cult that worships an atom bomb that stands in the middle of Megaton.

name: Abraham Washington
deck: He is the curator and founder of the Capitol Preservation Society in Rivet City, and tasks the Lone Wanderer with tracking down the Declaration of Independence, as well as any other historical document/artifact they come across.

name: Moira Brown
deck: The owner of the Craterside Supply and co-author of The Wasteland Survival Guide. She lives in Megaton.

name: Fawkes
deck: A smart super mutant you can rescue from Vault 87. He is a recruitable character. Fawkes is available as a companion only to those with positive karma.  His life and name allude to unsuccessful British rebel Guy Fawkes. Voiced by Wes Johnson

name: Amata
deck: One of the first characters you see in Fallout 3. She is a childhood friend of yours in Vault 101, and the daughter of the Overseer.

name: Gob
deck: Gob is the abused ghoul bartender who works against his will at Moriarty's Saloon in Megaton.

name: Nova
deck: A prostitute who works in Colin Moriarty's Saloon in Megaton.

name: Jericho
deck: Jericho is a possible companion NPC in Fallout 3 who reveals that he has left the life of a raider in the Wasteland behind him. Bad karma and 1,000 caps are needed to recruit him.

name: Eulogy Jones
deck: The head slaver of Paradise Falls.

name: Sierra Petrovita
deck: An addict of Nuka-Cola and all Nuka-Cola products. She tasks you with finding 30 Nuka-Cola Quantum for the Nuka-Cola Challenge side quest.

name: Dr. Preston
deck: A doctor (how strange) making a living in Rivet City.

name: Ken Ewers
deck: One of the few (sane) residents of Arefu. He does not like strangers.

name: Dr. Madison Li
deck: A scientist who formerly worked with James (the Vault 101 Dweller's father) on Project Purity in Fallout 3.

name: Colonel Autumn
deck: The commanding officer of the Enclave military in Fallout 3. He tries to thwart the success of Project Purity.

name: President John Henry Eden
deck: John Henry Eden is President of the United States and the Enclave in Fallout 3. Other than the radio reports on Enclave Radio, very little is known about him.

name: Silas
deck: A slaver and underling to Leroy Walker.

name: The Mechanist
deck: A super hero from Canterbury Commons who controls robots. He despises The AntAgonizer.

name: The AntAgonizer
deck: An ant-themed super villain from Canterbury Commons in Fallout 3. Her main goal is to defeat her nemesis, the Mechanist.

name: Cindy Cantelli
deck: The owner of A Quick Fix, a drug store on Rivet City. She has a husband, who is a drug addict.

name: Father Clifford
deck: The head of Saint Monica's Church on Rivet City. He leads a glitched sermon each sunday.

name: Evan King
deck: The sole protector of Arefu. His settlement has been struck with raids from The Family.

name: Lucy West
deck: Lucy is a former resident of Arefu who currently resides in Megaton. She is worried about her family because she hasn't heard from them lately.

name: Ian West
deck: Ian is Lucy West's brother. He lives in Arefu, and has a bizarre taste for human flesh.

name: Derek Pacion
deck: Derek is a young boy who lives in Canterbury Commons. Unlike Uncle Roe, Derek is excited about the presence of the super heroes.

name: Uncle Roe
deck: Uncle Roe is the mayor of Canterbury Commons who dislikes the presence of the two "superheroes". He also gives you a map of the caravan routes in the Capital Wasteland.

name: Sydney
deck: Sydney is a relic hunter who joins you on the "Stealing Independence" side-quest.

name: Leroy Walker
deck: Leroy Walker  the leader of the slavers at Lincoln Memorial. He wants you to return all Abraham Lincoln related artifacts to remove evidence of the illegality of slavery.

name: Mayor MacCready
deck: He is the mayor of Little Lamplight. He despises all "mungos".

name: Hannibal Hamlin
deck: An escaped slave who is the leader of a small settlement for other runaway slaves. He wants to create a safe place for slaves to live.

name: Dave
deck: Dave is the president of the autocratic Republic of Dave. He also happens to be a polygamist.

name: Mister Crowley
deck: A ghoul living in Underworld in Fallout 3. He tries to trick the player into murdering three innocent people (and one guilty one) to get his hands on an old stash of treasure.

name: Carol
deck: Carol is a pre- war ghoul who owns a diner/hotel in Underworld called "Carol's Place". She is a mother-figure for Gob.

name: Jaime
deck: Jaime is a Ghoul NPC that appears in the Basement of the Dunwich Building in Fallout 3.

name: Dukov
deck: A womanizing, Russian ex-mercenary who lives along the Potomac River. He lives with two prostitutes.

name: Cherry
deck: Cherry is one of Dukov's female escorts who wants to escape to Rivet City.

name: Reilly
deck: Reilly is the leader of Reilly's Rangers. She separates from the rest of her squad, and sends the Lone Wanderer to go find them.

name: Brick
deck: Brick is one of Reilly's Rangers. She is an aggressive heavy weapons specialist and has a special minigun named Eugene.

name: Butcher
deck: Butcher is one of the members of Reilly's Rangers. He is the medic of the squad.

name: Donovan
deck: Donovan is one of the members of Reilly's Rangers. He is the tech specialist.

name: Agatha
deck: Agatha is an old widow who lives by herself in an isolated house in the Capital Wasteland. She is a skilled violinist.

name: Grouse
deck: Grouse is a slaver at Paradise Falls.

name: Red
deck: Red is a citizen of Big Town. She gets captured by Super Mutants and is taken to the Germantown Police HQ.

name: Sticky
deck: Sticky is a character from Little Lamplight who gets kicked out for being too old. He tells annoying stories and has been compared to the Adoring Fan from Oblivion.

name: Alphonse Almodovar
deck: Alphonse Almodovar is the Vault 101 Overseer who doesn't want anyone entering or leaving the Vault. He is also the father of the Vault 101 Dweller's best friend, Amata.

name: Liberty Prime
deck: Liberty Prime is a giant communist-hating robot that the Brotherhood of Steel is hiding in the basement of the Citadel, formerly the Pentagon.

name: Butch
deck: Butch is the leader of the Tunnel Snakes.

name: Biwwy
deck: Biwwy is a wesident of Wittle Wamplight. Biwwy has a Wazer Wifle for sale.

name: Smiling Jack
deck: Possibly the only friendly raider, this merchant makes his living in the underground area of Evergreen Mills. He is perhaps most notable for his possession of "The Terrible Shotgun"

name: Shorty
deck: Shorty is one of the residents of Big Town who is taken to the Germantown Police HQ. Surprisingly, he actually is vertically challenged.

name: Betty
deck: Betty is presumably an innocent girl living in the Tranquility Lane simulation. In reality, Betty is the simulated form of a scientist named Stanislaus Braun.

name: Bannon
deck: The owner of Potomac Attire in Rivet City and is a member of the Rivet City Ruling Council.  His seat in the council is contested by Seagrave Holmes.

name: Sergeant RL-3
deck: A robotic soldier that can join your party in Fallout 3.

name: Charon
deck: A ghoul bouncer who has to obey whoever holds his contract. It is possible to buy his contract from a local ghoul, thus making him a permanent companion of the vault dweller. He can be found in Underworld, located in the Museum of American History.

name: Star Paladin Cross
deck: A Brotherhood of Steel paladin, Paladin Cross is a possible companion in Fallout 3.

name: Sarah Lyons
deck: Sarah Lyons is the daughter of the Elder Owyn Lyons. She is a very strong woman and is the commander of Lyons Pride.

name: Elder Lyons
deck: Elder Lyons is the leader of the Brotherhood of Steel in the Capital Wasteland. He takes refuge in the Citadel.

name: Ted Strayer
deck: A character who lives in Rivet City. He is one of the people Mr. Crowley wants you to obtain a key from in the "You Gotta Shoot em In the Head" quest.

name: Mr. Lopez
deck: Mr. Lopez is a 65 year old resident of Rivet City who is considering committing suicide.

name: Shrapnel
deck: Shrapnel is the co-owner of Flak 'N Shrapnel's weapons and ammunition store in Rivet City.

name: Three Dog
deck: "Cause one dog ain't enough, and two is too low, it's me, Three Dog!"

name: Wernher
deck: The only slave to have escaped from The Pitt and leader in the slaves rebellion against Ashur

name: Ashur
deck: Formerly of the Brotherhood of Steel, Ashur is the self-proclaimed "Lord of The Pitt", and has made great strides to creating a civilization.

name: Armitage
deck: Armitage is the personal bodyguard of Dr. Zimmer

name: Constantine Chase
deck: Constantine Chase was the commander of Operation Anchorage.

name: Ronald Laren
deck: Girdershade resident in Fallout 3. Giving Laren Nuka Cola Quantum instead of Sierra is rumored to forfeit the "Nuka-Cola Challenge" achievement.

name: General Jingwei
deck: General Jingwei is the leading Commander in the Chinese invasion of Alaska.

name: Horace Pinkerton
deck: Horace Pinkerton is an old man living in the broken bow of the establishment he helped found, Rivet City.

name: Herbert "Daring" Dashwood
deck: Herbert Dashwood (nicknamed Daring) is a retired adventurer that can be heard on his radio show with his stalwart ghoul manservant Argyle.

name: Mother Maya
deck: Mother Maya is the wife of Confessor Cromwell (The leader of The Church of the Children of Atom). She is referred to by members of The Church of the Children as The Mother.

name: Gary Staley
deck: Owns a diner located in the Rivet City marketplace.

name: Desmond Lockheart
deck: Desmond Lockheart is a character that appears in the Fallout 3 expansion, Point Lookout. Desmond, a ghoul, is one of the main quest givers throughout the DLC.

name: Tobar the Ferryman
deck: Tobar takes you to and from Point Lookout in Fallout 3, but only if you have a ferry ticket.

name: Andy Stahl
deck: Andy Stahl is the owner of The Brass Lantern

name: Billy Creel
deck: Billy Creel is a resident of Megaton and foster father of Maggie

name: Deputy Steel
deck: Deputy Steel is the guard for the armory in Megaton

name: Harden Simms
deck: Harden Simms is the son of Lucas Simms

name: Maggie
deck: Maggie is a child living in Megaton who lives with Billy Creel.

name: Manya Vargas
deck: Manya Vargas is the wife of Nathan Vargas

name: Walter
deck: Walter is the man in charge of maintaining the failing Water Processing Plant in Megaton.

name: Harkness
deck: Harkness is the chief of security for Rivet City and is the Android that Zimmer is looking for in the quest The Replicated Man

name: Tammy Hargrave
deck: Tammy Hargrave is the alcoholic mother of James Hargrave.

name: James Hargrave
deck: James Hargrave is the son of Tammy Hargrave

name: Angela Staley
deck: Angela Staley is the daughter of Gary Staley

name: Anna Holt
deck: Anna Holt is a scientist working with Doctor Li

name: Belle Bonny
deck: Belle Bonny is the owner of the Muddy Rudder

name: Brock
deck: Brock is the guard of the Muddy Rudder

name: C.J. Young
deck: C.J. Young is the daughter of Christie Young & Henry Young and is a friend of James Hargrave

name: Christie Young
deck: Christie Young is the wife of Henry Young and mother of C.J. Young

name: Diego
deck: Diego is a acolyte living in Rivet City. He spends most of his time at the Saint Monica's Church in Rivet City.

name: Garza
deck: Garza is a engineer working in Rivet City

name: Henry Young
deck: Henry Young is the husband of Christie Young and father of C.J. Young

name: Janice Kaplinski
deck: Janice Kaplinski is a scientist working with Dr. Madison Li

name: Commander Danvers
deck: Lana Danvers is the right hand of Harkness in security for Rivet City

name: Mei Wong
deck: Mei Wong is an escaped slave who thinks she's being hunted down by a slaver named Sister in Rivet City.

name: Mister Buckingham
deck: Mister Buckingham is the concierge of Weatherly Hotel

name: Paulie Cantelli
deck: Paulie Cantelli is a chem addict, the husband of Cindy Cantelli, and the owner of A Quick Fix.

name: Private Jones
deck: Private Jones is the Rivet City armory guard

name: Sister
deck: Sister is an unapologetic slaver who was looking for an escaped android in Rivet City.

name: Trinnie
deck: Trinnie is a citizen in Rivet City

name: Vera Weatherly
deck: Vera Weatherly is the owner of Weatherly Hotel

name: Bumble
deck: Bumble is a resident of Little Lamplight

name: Eclair
deck: Eclair is the owner and cook of his restaurant Spelunkers located in Little Lamplight.

name: Joseph
deck: Joseph is the only teacher at the schoolhouse in Little Lamplight, and is the brother of Penny.

name: Knick Knack
deck: Knick Knack is the owner of the Souvenir shop in Little Lamplight, and is the brother of Knock Knock his twin sister.

name: Knock Knock
deck: Knock Knock is the Morale officer of Little Lamplight, and is the sister of Knick Knack her twin brother.

name: Lucy
deck: Lucy is the 11 year old doctor of Little Lamplight.

name: Penny
deck: Penny is a resident of Little Lamplight, and the sister of Joseph.

name: Princess
deck: Princess is a resident of Little Lamplight who was once the mayor of it for only five minutes before MacCready punched her in the nose and became the new mayor.

name: Sammy
deck: Sammy is a resident of Little Lamplight.

name: Squirrel
deck: Squirrel is a resident of Little Lamplight.

name: Zip
deck: Zip is a fast-talking resident of Little Lamplight, and is addicted to Nuka-Cola.

name: Carolina Red
deck: Carolina Red is a female slaver located in Paradise Falls.

name: Cutter
deck: Cutter is the doctor of Paradise Falls.

name: Forty
deck: Forty is Eulogy's right hand man and is one of the many slavers at Paradise Falls.

name: Jotun
deck: Jotun is a slaver resident of Paradise Falls, and is the son of Ymir.

name: Pronto
deck: Pronto is the owner of Lock and Load.

name: Ymir
deck: Ymir is a slaver living in Paradise falls with his son Jotun.

name: Bittercup
deck: A dark and flighty resident of Big Town in Fallout 3, who has dated nearly every other member of the town at one time. If you befriend her, she'll give you items she picks up when she's supposed to be on patrol.

name: Deputy Weld
deck: Deputy Weld is the protectron that protects the gate to Megaton

name: Stockholm
deck: Stockholm is the lookout guard for Megaton.

name: Defender Rockfowl
deck: Defender Rockfowl is a member of the Outcasts. He patrols the highway over Fort Independence.

name: Protecter Casdin
deck: Protector Casdin is the leader of the Brotherhood Outcasts. He is usually found at Fort Independence, the Outcast's headquarters.

name: Defender Morgan
deck: Defender Morgan is a Brotherhood Outcast who patrols the entrance to Fort Independence.

name: Tinker Joe
deck: Tinker Joe is a merchant whom you can buy Sergeant RL-3 from in Fallout 3.

name: Gary
deck: Gary is an inhabitant of Vault 108. It was in Vault 108 where they cloned him...at least fifty-four times.

name: Sonora Cruz
deck: Sonora Cruz is the leader of the vigilante group the Regulators in Fallout 3. She may trade fingers for caps & karma under the right circumstance!

name: Flash
deck: Flash is a confident inhabitant of Big Town who is proud of his wimpy .32 pistol.

name: Uncle Leo
deck: Uncle Leo is one of two friendly Super Mutants in Fallout 3. His appearance is a random event.

name: Scribe Rothchild
deck: Reginald Rothchild is essentially Elder Owyn Lyons' right hand man. He is the Head Scribe who is also in charge of getting Liberty Prime operational again.

name: Scribe Bigsley
deck: Bigsley is a Brotherhood of Steel scribe who is assigned to the role of keeping track of water distribution in the Broken Steel DLC.

name: Mother Curie III
deck: The pacifist leader of the cult residing just outside of Megaton

name: Officer Lepelletier
deck: Lepelletier is a member of the Rivet City security force. She is put in charge of managing the protection of the water caravans in the Broken Steel DLC.

name: Bob
deck: Bob is the tree growing out of Harold the ghoul's head. Sometimes, Harold likes to joke that Bob's name is actually "Herbert".

name: Catherine
deck: Mother of the player character from Fallout 3. Dies shortly after from cardiac arrest, but is a pivotal character within the game.

name: Jonas
deck: Lab assistant to the player's father in Fallout 3. Sacrifices his life to protect father's message to child.

name: Clover
deck: Clover is a slave character companion in the game Fallout 3.

name: Ted
deck: A deceased merchant found under the Anchorage Memorial in the Capital Wastelands in Fallout 3.

name: Bill Wilson
deck: One of the seven residents of the town of Andale in Fallout 3.

name: Roger Maxson
deck: Founder and first High Elder of the Brotherhood of Steel.

name: Roger Maxson II
deck: Son of Brotherhood of Steel founder Roger Maxson, and successor as High Elder of the order.

name: John Maxson
deck: Third High Elder of the Brotherhood of Steel, and member of the founding Maxson family.

name: Jeremy Maxson
deck: High Elder of the Brotherhood of Steel and descendant of founder Roger Maxson.

name: Carl Bell
deck: Captain in the United States Air Force who became the first human in space in the Fallout universe.

name: Medusa
deck: Medusa is often portrayed in games as a creature that is a cross between a woman and a snake. The lower body is often a snake tail, and the hair is usually a mass of snakes. Other than this, the head and torso are that of a woman.

name: Puck
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Clockwerk
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2 coated in a mechanical suit of armor.

name: Anti-Mage
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Tidehunter
deck: Tidehunter is a playable strength hero for the Dire in Dota 2.

name: Earthshaker
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Faceless Void
deck: Darkterror the Faceless Void is a melee agility hard carry hero in Dota 2 voiced by Dave Fennoy. His unique abilities provide him with escape mechanism, strong initiation and team fight contribution. He scales well into the late game and with the right build can dominate the game.

name: Vengeful Spirit
deck: Playable Hero in Dota 2.

name: Enigma
deck: Playable Hero in Dota 2.

name: Lion
deck: Playable Hero in Dota 2.

name: Ancient Apparition
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Beastmaster
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Crystal Maiden
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Dark Seer
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2, Dark Seer is a melee intelligence hero with abilities designed to manipulate the movements of other players.

name: Drow Ranger
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Night Stalker
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Spectre
deck: Spectre is an Agility carry hero. She is known for being one of the hardest carries in DOTA2, although requiring an absurd amount of farm to reach that point.

name: Windranger
deck: Lyralei the Windranger is an Intelligence hero from Dota 2 that uses her quick feet and bow to stay out of her opponent's range while harassing them. She is often played as an offlane solo hero but she is versatile enough to fill many roles.

name: Pugna
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Sven
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Lich
deck: An intelligence hero in Dota 2 who uses Ice-Element attacks, his ultimate is Chain Frost.

name: Weaver
deck: Skitskurr the Weaver is a playable ranged agility hero in Dota 2 voiced by David Scully. His unique style of play would not suit any player, but mastering it is extremely rewarding. Just pray those pesky enemies don't have true vision on you.

name: Tiny
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Leshrac
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Mirana
deck: Mirana, the Princess of the Moon is a ranged Agility hero from Dota 2.

name: Chen
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Venomancer
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Shadow Shaman
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Witch Doctor
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Sniper
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Shadow Fiend
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Viper
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Tinker
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Morphling
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2. Morphling is ranged agility hero that can manipulate its stats by increasing its agility by decreasing its strength or increasing its strength by decreasing its agility by using its 3rd skill Morph.

name: Pudge
deck: Pudge the Butcher is a melee strength hero in Dota 2 voiced by John Patrick Lowrie. Though he may not look like it, he is one of the strongest solo-killing gankers in the entire game with a signature skill-shot which is hard to land, but almost guarantees a kill for your team.

name: Axe
deck: Axe is a Strength hero for the Dire side in Dota 2.

name: Dragon Knight
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Kunkka
deck: Kunkka is a playable strength hero for the Radiant side in Dota 2.

name: Juggernaut
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Huskar
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Lifestealer
deck: N'aix the Lifestealer is a Dire melee strength hero that excels in dealing physical damage. Typically, Lifestealer's role is seen as a mid-late game carry.

name: Wraith King
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2. Formerly known as "Skeleton King," both characters play exactly the same and have the same stats.

name: Bloodseeker
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Clinkz
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Broodmother
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Templar Assassin
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Riki
deck: Riki is a playable melee agility hero in Dota 2.

name: Queen of Pain
deck: Queen of Pain a Dire Intelligence hero who is played as a semi-carry/ganker, she uses high burst damage to kill her enemies and uses her blink ability to escape or enter battles.

name: Batrider
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Jakiro
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Omniknight
deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Warlock
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Alchemist
deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Roshan
deck: Roshan is the strongest neutral creep in DotA Allstars and Dota 2, which heroes can kill for the Aegis of the Immortal.

deck: A playable hero in Dota 2.

deck: Playable hero in Dota 2.

name: Oracle
deck: One of the playable heroes in Dota 2.

name: Winter Wyvern
deck: Auroth the Winter Wyvern is a ranged intelligence support in Dota 2. Her abilities give her great potential to slow enemies, heal allies, and even stun large groups.

name: Commander Shepard
deck: Commander Shepard is the main protagonist of the Mass Effect trilogy.  Throughout  the game, the player's decisions can affect Shepard's personality, consequently changing how both individuals and entire races view him/her and the human race.  Key choices can even affect the outcomes of situations throughout the story.

name: Urdnot Wrex
deck: Urdnot Wrex, a Krogan Battlemaster, is one of the available party members from Mass Effect.

name: Garrus Vakarian
deck: Garrus Vakarian is a Turian Agent and member of C-Sec.  He is a possible squad member in all three Mass Effect games.

name: Ashley Williams
deck: A blunt, no nonsense marine, Gunnery Chief Ashley Williams is one of the first squadmates who joins the crew in Mass Effect. She remains with Commander Shepard potentially throughout the game, and if pursued, can be a male Commander Shepard's love interest.

name: Liara T'soni
deck: A young Asari highly skilled in both research and biotics, Liara T'Soni is one of Commander Shepard's companions in the Mass Effect series, as well as a potential love interest.

image.image_tag: All Images, Mass Effect 2, Lair of the Shadow Broker

name: Sovereign
deck: A reconnaissance Reaper serving as a vanguard, attempting to summon an entire Reaper fleet to wipe out all organic life every fifty thousand years.

name: Tali'Zorah nar Rayya
deck: A female Quarian team member in the Mass Effect series. Tali is a capable engineer with highly developed technical skills. Throughout Mass Effect, Tali reveals much of the life of the Quarians. She is one of a select few characters fully playable throughout the Mass Effect Trilogy.

image.image_tag: All Images, Strong Women, Mass Effect 2

name: Kaidan Alenko
deck: A human team member who accompanies Commander Shepard  from the beginning of Mass Effect. Kaiden is skilled in both Biotics and Tech, but struggles to keep control, due to the physical side-effects of his implanting.

name: Donnel Udina
deck: Ambassador Donnel Udina is a human diplomat stationed on the Citadel. He thinks humans deserve more consideration in running galactic affairs.

name: David Anderson
deck: Former Captain of the Normandy and possibly the human representative on the Citadel council. He is voiced by the actor Keith David

name: Jeff "Joker" Moreau
deck: Flight Lieutenant Jeff "Joker" Moreau is the pilot of both the SSV Normandy and the Normandy SR-2.

name: The Shadow Broker
deck: The Shadow Broker is an informations broker with infiltrators in all major factions, including Cerberus. The only persons who know the true identity behind the name are Commander Shepard and his/her team.

name: Dr. Chakwas
deck: Dr. Chakwas is the Chief medical officer of the Normandy in Mass Effect 1, 2, and 3. She is very polite and exhibits a mother-like attitude towards the crew.

name: The Illusive Man
deck: The Illusive Man is the leader of the Cerberus group mentioned in Mass Effect. His goal with the Cerberus project is to make humans the most powerful race in the galaxy.

name: Navigator Pressly
deck: Executive Officer Pressly assumes the role as the navigator of the SSV Normandy. His grandfather was a veteran of "The First Contact War" resulting in his  xenophobic nature, particularly toward the Tuarians. His role is of an NPC character.

name: Jack
deck: A powerful biotic, Subject Zero is one of the new crew members for Mass Effect 2. Shepard first encounters her on the prison ship Purgatory.

name: Grunt
deck: A Krogan who joins Commander Shepard's team in Mass Effect 2. He is younger than Wrex, but just as aggressive if not more. In his debut trailer he was seen charging the enemy similar to the Krogan warlords in the original game.

name: Legion
deck: Legion is a Geth collective intelligence comprising of 1,183 formerly separate Geth intelligences. An Advanced module, his platform is capable of speech and is made to interact with organic beings as well as to be proficient in the use of more weapons than production model Geth.

name: Samara
deck: Samara is a Justicar, a member of an ancient order of Asari biotic vigilante warriors. She is part of Commander Shepard's squad in Mass Effect 2.

name: Thane Krios
deck: Thane is the most feared assassin in the Mass Effect galaxy.

name: Admiral Steven Hackett
deck: Admiral Steven Hackett is the commanding officer of the fifth fleet and an admiral in the Alliance Navy. During the events of Mass Effect, he gives Commander Shepard optional assignments related to the Systems Alliance. He is stationed at Arcturus Station.

name: Aria
deck: Aria is the owner of Afterlife, a Nightclub on Omega. She is also a very powerful figure on the installation in the Asteroid, having many sources of information, resources and guards.

name: Zaeed Messani
deck: Zaeed Massani is one of the most well known and feared bounty hunters in the galaxy, hired by Cerberus to help Shepard combat the Collectors.

name: Mordin Solus
deck: Mordin Solus is a recruitable Salarian scientist in Mass Effect 2. He is a fast-talking scientist that speaks in very short sentences; he is also noted as a fine singer.

name: Kelly Chambers
deck: A Cerberus Yeoman assigned to the Normandy SR2. She performs administrative duties and monitors Shepard's crew, messages, and fish.

name: Morinth
deck: From the Mass Effect franchise, Morinth is daughter of Samara and one of the three known Ardat-Yakshi, a genetic branch of Asari with a mating defect which results in the death of their partner. Morinth chooses to use this to dominate and destroy the minds of unsuspecting victims.

name: Niftu Cal
deck: An initially unwilling Volus recipient of biotic enhancements in Mass Effect 2, he suffers from illusions of grandeur during his encounter with Commander Shepard

name: Pitne For
deck: A Volus merchant encountered in Nos Astra Spaceport, Illium, in Mass Effect 2.

name: Dakni Kur
deck: Little is known about this character, other than he is the murdered Volus business partner of Pitne For in Mass Effect 2.

name: Anaya
deck: A matter-of-fact Asari detective policing the city of Illium in Mass Effect 2.

name: Harrot
deck: An elcor merchant running 'Harrot's Emporium,' on Omega in Mass Effect 2.

name: Harbinger
deck: In the Mass Effect series, Harbinger is the first Reaper ever made who manipulates the Collectors against Commander Shepard.

name: Kor Tun
deck: A Volus encountered while passing through the Citadel in Mass Effect 2. Claims a Quarian stole his credit chit.

name: Harkin
deck: The first human C-Sec officer, known for taking bribes and roughing up suspects in custody. Described by Captain Anderson as "a disgrace to the species". Harkin returns in Mass Effect 2 as a contact in Garrus' mission going by the alias "Fade". Harkin is voiced by Roger Jackson.

name: Kal'Reegar
deck: A Quarian marine sent to Haelstrom to protect Tali'Zorah on a fact-finding mission. He encounters Commander Shepard during Tali's recruiting mission.

name: Human-Reaper
deck: The final boss of Mass Effect 2. A Reaper created by the Collectors using a substance made from thousands of human colonists' bodies after they are abducted and processed by the Collectors.

name: Shiala
deck: An Asari in Mass Effect that was "sacrificed" to the Thorian on Feros, causing them to share one consciousness.

name: EDI
deck: EDI (Enhanced Defense Intelligence)is the on-board AI of the SSV Normandy SR2.  It assists the helmsman in piloting the ship and relays information to the crew.

name: Conrad Verner
deck: Conrad Verner is a huge fan of Commander Shepard. He can be found in the Upper Markets of the Wards in Mass Effect 1 and returns in Mass Effect 2 wearing replica N7 armor and can be found in a bar on Illium.

name: Administrator Anoleis
deck: Administrator Anoleis is a salarian who runs Port Hanshan on the planet of Noveria.

name: Gianna Parasini
deck: A side character in both Mass Effect 1 and 2 who implores Commander Shepard to assist her with undercover work.

name: Warden Kuril
deck: A high ranking Turian within the Blue Suns who runs a prison ship called Purgatory in Mass Effect 2.

name: Nassana Dantius
deck: A sneaky asari diplomat who hires Commander Shepard to kill her sister.

name: Kasumi Goto
deck: Kasumi is a master thief hired by Cerberus to aid Commander Shepard on his mission to stop the Collectors.

name: Kolyat Krios
deck: Kolyat is Thane's son in Mass Effect 2. He appears in Thane's loyalty mission where you are tasked to follow and protect him in the Citadel.

name: Donovan Hock
deck: Donovan Hock is a weapons dealer and art collector who resides on the planet Bekenstein. His mansion is also home to a vault which contains many priceless artifacts from galactic history.

name: Urz
deck: Urz is a friendly varren found on Tuchanka.  He can be recuited for use in the pit fights for some extra credits.

name: Rupert Gardner
deck: The Mess Sergeant aboard the Normandy SR-2 in Mass Effect 2.

name: Khalisah al-Jilani
deck: Brazen reporter whose sensationalist interviews could incite Shepard to violence.

name: Tela Vasir
deck: Formidable vanguard Spectre who investigates the disappearance of Liara T'soni.
